Luzmila es una mujer de 33 que se dedica a la venta de sándwiches con el fin de sacar, sola, a su hija de 7 años adelante. Luzmila es separada desde hace algún tiempo, pero esto no la detuvo para demostrarse a sí misma y a su pequeña que ella sería el sustento para su familia.

Luzmila empezó a vender en su carrito sándwichero desde hace un año, tiempo en el que ha aprendido como realizar la preparación adecuada para sus productos. Ella tuvo algunos problemas familiares y fue por ello que decidió empezar en este tipo de negocio debido a que era práctico, ya que solo tiene que sacar su carrito en las tardes y noches, fuera de su casa.

Luzmila está contenta de gozar con buena salud, ya que hasta el momento no tiene ninguna decadencia y esto le permite esforzarse más y más. Con el apoyo que se le está brindando ella podrá comprar embutidos, papas al hilo y otros productos con el fin de que sus clientes tengan mucha más variedad. Luzmila está muy contenta por la ayuda que se le está brindando. Con el tiempo desea poder incrementar sus ganancias, lo que la llevará a cumplir su gran sueño “ Tener su propio Restaurant”.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a woman who is 33 years old and makes a living selling sandwiches with the goal of raising her 7-year-old daughter alone.  Luzmila has been separated for a while, but this has not prevented her from demonstrating to herself and to her little girl that she would be the provider for the family.

Luzmila started selling from her sandwich cart a year ago, during which time he has learned how to properly prepare her products.  She had some family problems, and for that reason she decided to start this type of business since it was practical and all she had to do was take her cart outside her house during the afternoons and evenings.

Luzmila is happy to have good health.  Up to this point she has not had any decline in health and this allows her to work harder and harder.  With the support that she is provided, she will be able to buy sausages, French fries, and other products, so that she can offer her customers greater variety.
Luzmila is very happy for the support she is getting.  With time, she would like to increase her earnings, which will help her reach her big dream “to have her own restaurant”.

loans.use: to buy sausages, French fries, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his Internet booths and buy iron rods, etc.

loans.name: Ana Ermelinda

texts.es:
ANA ERMELINA TIENE 41 AÑOS DE EDAD ES DIVORSIADA NO TIENE HIJOS, VIVE CON LOS PADRES EN SAN MIGUEL DE BOLÍVAR.

ANA SE DEDICA A AYUDAR EN UN RESTAURANTE, SOLICITA EL CRÉDITO COMPRAR MESAS, SILLAS, COSINA, OLLAS, MANTELES. 

CON LA AYUDA DEL CRÉDITO PODRÁ COMPRAR LO NECESARIO PARA PONERCE EL PROPIO NEGOCIO UN RESTAURANTE.

LAS COMPRAS LO HARA EN GUARANDA. EL SUEÑO E SPODER CONSTRUIR UNA CASA.

 EL DESAFÍO AL QUE SE ENFRENTA ES SEGUIR ADELANTE CON EL NEGOCIO. EN EL TIEMPO LIBRE LE GUTS AVER TELEVISIÓN.
texts.en: Ana Ermelia, 41, is divorced; she has no children.  She lives with her parents in San Miguel de Bolívar.  Ana works as a helper in a restaurant.  She’s asking for the loan to buy tables, chairs, a stove, pots and tablecloths.  With help from the loan she will be able to buy what’s needed for her to open her own restaurant.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.  Her dream is to be able to build a house.  The challenge she faces is to continue forward with the business.  In her free time she enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, a stove, pots and tablecloths.

loans.name: Elias Jose

texts.es: El señor Elías es dueño de un pequeño tramo ubicado en el mercado  en el cual se comercializa ropa nueva para  hombre y mujer como pantalones y camisas entre otros desde hace 4 años. Tiene 2 hijos ambos asisten a la escuela primaria este su segundo crédito Kiva el primer crédito lo invirtió en su negocio y aumento el tamaño de su inventario fue de mucha ayuda para su negocio esta muy agradecido por el apoyo recibido de Kiva actualmente solicito el crédito para invertir en comprar shorts al por mayor, camisetas que son muy usados durante esta  época de  verano que es cuando sus ventas  experimentan incrementos.
texts.en:
Elías owns a small space in the market where he’s been selling new clothes for men and women like pants and shirts, among others for four years.  He has two children both of which are attending elementary school.  

This is his second Kiva loan.  He used the first loan to invest in his business and increased the size of his inventory.  It was of much help for his business and he’s very grateful for the support he got from Kiva.

He’s currently requesting the loan to buy shorts at wholesale and t-shirts that are very popular during the summer season which is when his sales increase.

loans.use: to buy shorts and t-shirts.

loans.name: Colombe Group

texts.en:
Jacques, age 56, is married with five children. Four of his children are attending school. He operates a butcher shop in a local market in Brazzaville.

He has had this business for 21 years! He has gained many valuable customers and a lot of business experiences over the years. Jacques will use the loan to buy more fish, chicken, and beef to sell in his shop. When asked about difficulties he has with his business, Jacques responded that he needs larger loans. He is a very hard working ambitious entrepreneur! 

Jacques has received three previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. He has a very good repayment record. He hopes to one day be able to travel outside of Brazzaville to buy meat. He wants his children to be successful and would like to see them work for HOPE Congo.

loans.use: to buy fish, chicken, and beef.

loans.name: Les Enfants Unis 2 (#1) Group

texts.en:
Marina, age 22, is a single mother with two children. Both of her children are attending school. She runs a small bakery where she sells pastries and cakes in a local market. She has had this business for seven years. Marina will use the loan to buy sugar and flour. Her strategies are to offer good quality products and to bake and sell the most popular products. She tries to provide what her customers like best. 

Marina has received three previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a very good repayment record. The rain poses a great difficulty to her because her stand in the market does not keep out the rain. She hopes to build a more fortified stand and, as she grows, to eventually build a boutique. She will continue to receive loans from HOPE Congo because they are helping her to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar and flour.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en: Rhoda is a businesswoman. She is married with three children. She sells mats and fabric to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and describes her business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her living standards and she hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy mats and fabric to sell.

loans.use: To buy mats and fabric to sell

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel de 49 años de edad y madre de dos hijos en las edades de 25 y 27 años, tiene un pequeño taller de confecciones, actividad que aprendió por tradición de su madre y su abuela quienes se dedicaron también al mismo oficio. Cuando Maribel inició lo hizo ayudándolas y haciendo vestidos de muñecas y en la medida en que iniciaron sus ganancias, ahorró para comprar sus primeras máquinas que aun conserva y son de mucha utilidad. En la actualidad se dedica a la confección de uniformes, que vende a estudiantes de varios colegios de la ciudad, pero su mayor desafío es actualizar sus procesos productivos porque la infraestructura con la que cuenta no le permite hacer bordados ni pegar botones. En la actualidad Maribel está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará  una maquina moderna para agilizar sus trabajo y desarrollar otras alternativas productivas como el bordado y pegada de botones. Su inversión resultará exitosa, porque aumentará la efectividad de su tarea productiva y potencializará la oferta de servicios que no solo aplicará a sus prendas, sino que pueden ser opciones generadoras de ingresos.
texts.en:
Maribel is 49 years old and the mother of two children, ages 25 and 27.  She has a small sewing shop, a job she learned in the tradition of her mother and grandmother, who worked at the same job.  When Maribel began she did it helping them and making doll outfits, and as she earned profits, she saved to buy her first machines.  She still has them and they are very useful.

Currently she works making uniforms that she sells to students in various schools in the city.  Her greatest challenge is updating her production methods, because the infrastructure she has does not allow her to do embroidery or button application.
 
Maribel is requesting a Kiva loan with which she will buy a modern machine to make her work easier and develop productive alternatives such as embroidery and button application.  Her investment will be successful because it will increase her work productivity and improve the services she offers.  Not only will this apply to her garments, they also can be options for generating income.

loans.use: to buy a modern machine.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: La señora Cecilia,   es una clienta antigua de la institución que por la  proximidad de su domicilio siempre solicita crédito en la agencia, demostró un trato amable y Cortez en la avaluación que se la hizo, además por el buen historial crediticio que demostró en los anteriores créditos, La Sra. Cecilia vive en la zona alto San Pedro, de la ciudad de la paz Bolivia, la Sra. Cecilia se dedica a la elaboración y envasado de crema de árnica actividad donde le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, también tiene un café internet por la zona y por este motivo solicito el crédito que es para la compra de una maquina computadora, la Sra. Cecilia  es muy trabajadora y además abnegada con su trabajo, ella tiene la voluntad de que con trabajo, va un día tener su negocio en un lugar mas comercial y con mayor producción y rentabilidad, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a longstanding client of the institution who because of the nearness of her home always seeks credit from the agency.  She behaved nicely and courteously during the evaluation she underwent.  In addition, she established good credit history with her previous loans. 

Cecilia lives in the Alto San Pedro zone in the city of La Paz, Bolivia.  Cecilia works making and bottling cream of arnica, an activity she does well in because she has a large clientele.  She also has an Internet café in the zone and this is why she’s asking for the loan to buy a computer.

Cecilia is very hardworking and self-sacrificing at work.  She’s convinced that with her willingness to work one day her business will be more commercial, productive and profitable.  She is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Les Enfants Unis 2 (#2) Group

texts.en:
Silvere, age 37, is a single father with two-year-old twin boys. He owns a butcher shop in a local market.

He has operated this business for one and a half years. He purposely located himself in a specific community where there was not a butcher shop. He feels this has been an important factor in his business' success.

Silvere will buy a refrigerator and a small generator. The electricity in Brazzaville is unreliable and, if it is off for too long, his meat will spoil. The generator will allow him to keep his freezers and refrigerator running even if the electricity goes out. 

Silvere has received three previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. He has a very good repayment record. As he continues to grow, he wants  eventually to transport live fish to Brazzaville from the coast. This will allow him to stock a greater variety of fish as well as offer very fresh fish to his customers. He hopes that his two boys will be successful and wants to be able to provide them with a good education.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and small generator.

loans.name: Andrea Amy

texts.en: Andrea is a trained educator from Alabama. She has spent her life striving to help educate young people in her community. After being a teacher for years, she went back to school to receive her Masters in Education. With this degree, she aspires to open her own, home-based education center for children 4 - 14 years old to teach them advanced math. She hopes to educate up to 20 children a week in a very intimate setting, having four children to a session every day of the week. She also plans to dedicate her Saturdays to her business as well. On Saturdays, she will have special tutoring sessions for children who may have fallen behind or who need extra help in any given subject. She is asking for this loan to become part of a franchised educating community that will allow her the opportunity to have an online platform and that will allow her access to books and other materials that she will need for her classes.

loans.use: To purchase books and other materials and to set up an online platform for teaching.

loans.name: Jalapilla Group

texts.es:
El grupo Jalapilla esta integrado 4 mujeres alegres y trabajadoras cada una de ellas tuene una actividad economica la cual desarrollan con el objetivo de tener   mas ingresos economicos y asi poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de Aserradero a 10 minutos del municipio de Acatlan de Perez Figueroa en el estado de Oaxaca, esta comunidad se caracteriza por estar en una zona cañera y sus habitantes se dedican a la siembra y corte de caña de azucar.

Doña Eva es uno de los miembros de este grupo, ella  tiene la edad de 38 años y es madre soltera de un niño de nombre Diego de 15 años de edad que asiste a la escuela secundaria de Acatlan. Doña Eva nos platica que ella inicio trabajando fuera de casa de dependienta pero un día decidio  vender ropa interior por catalogo y se dio cuenta de que ganaba mas y tenia mas tiempo para estar a lado de su hijo y educarlo, ella tiene ya mas de 2 años vendiendo ropa interior, nos comenta que ella vende casa por casa, lleva los catálogos a sus clientes, levanta pedido lo encarga a sus proveedores y posteriormente cuando le llega el pedido lo entrega y recibe el pago por sus productos, ella vende en su comunidad y también sale a otros pueblos como Cosolapa, Tezonapa, Refugio y Motzorongo. Ella nos dice que decidió iniciar a trabajar ya que es madre soltera y tenia que vestir, calzar y alimentar a su hijo, doña Eva también tiene un pequeño corral en la parte de atrás de su casa en donde tiene unos borregos los cuales cría y después vende, ella necesita este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de catálogos, ropa interior y alimento para sus borregos. 
Doña Eva espera que con este préstamo su negocio prospere y con sus ganancias poder vender sabanas y colchas; ella quiere seguir trabajando ya que quiere que su hijo en un futuro tenga una profesión. Doña Eva se encuentra agradecida con la fundación por la oportunidad que le esta dando con este préstamo de que su negocio prospere y por la confianza que le a brindado al otorgarle este préstamo.

los demas miembros de este grupo son:
Veronica club de nutricion
Ana venta de cosmeticos
Maria club de nutricion
texts.en:
The “Jalapilla” group is composed of four cheerful, hardworking women.  Each of them has an economic activity she carries out in order to have more income and provide her family with a better quality of life.  This group is located in the community of Aserradero ten minutes from the municipality of Acatlán de Pérez Figueroa in the state of Oaxaca.  This community is noted for sugarcane production and its residents work planting and cutting sugar cane.

Eva is one of the members of this group.  She’s 38 years old and is a single mother of a 15 year old son, Diego, who attends secondary school in Acatlán.  

Eva tells us that she started out working outside the home as an employee but one day decided to sell underwear via catalogue and noted that she earned more this way and had more time to spend with her son and educate him.  She’s been selling underwear for more than two years now and she comments that she sells house to house.  

She takes the catalogues to her customers, takes their orders, places them with her suppliers and the when the orders are delivered to her she delivers them and collects payment.  She sells in her community and also goes out to other towns like Cosolapa, Texonapa, Refugio and Motzorongo.  She tells us that she decided to start to work because she’s a single mother and she had to clothe, shoe and feed her son.  Eva also has a small corral in her back yard where she has some sheep she raises to then sell.  She needs the loan to buy catalogues, underwear and feed for her sheep.

Eva hopes that with this loan her business will prosper and she will be able to use her profits to sell sheets and bedspreads.  She wants to keep working because she wants her son to have a profession in the future.  Eva is grateful to the Fundación for the opportunity it’s giving her with this loan so that her business can make progress and for the trust placed in her by granting the loan.

The other group members are:

Veronica-nutrition club
Ana-cosmetics sales
María-nutrition club

loans.use: to buy catalogues, underwear and feed for her sheep.

location.town: Aserradero, Acatlan de Perez Figueroa, Oaxaca

loans.name: Lham-Erdene

texts.en: Lham-Erdene is a 34-year-old woman who lives with her husband and two children in Bayanhongor province in Southern Mongolia. Her husband works as a fireman in the wintertime. She started her garment retailing business in 2005. She brings the supplies from China and trades them at her well positioned shop counter in the town. The business has been successful and has made many regular customers. Lham-Erdene is a diligent and smart woman who says, "I would like to develop the business activities by buying the garments in large quantities so that I could save the transportation expense to China and save it for the future". The total amount she is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy more garments.

loans.use: To buy more garments to sell

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru:
Саламат 44 года, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей, младшему из которых 4 года. Саламат работает бухгалтером в сельской управе и в качестве дополнительного дохода -  с 2009 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 20,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день, в хозяйстве Саламат имеется 3 головы дойных коров, 10 голов овец, 6 голов коз, доходы от продажи молока составляют примерно 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Саламат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Саламат планирует вложить в увеличение хозяйства за счет выращивании картофеля.
texts.en: Salamat is 44 years old, married and raising four children, the youngest of whom is four years old.  Salamat works as an accountant in the village governing office and, to provide additional income, has been involved in animal husbandry since 2009, having started this business with an initial sum of 20,000 som (KGS).  Today, Salamat's business contains three dairy cows, ten sheep and six goats; the earnings from sales of milk amount to about 5,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Salamat requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into expanding her business due to growing potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Batzorig

texts.en: Batzorig is a 31-year-old man who lives with his wife and two daughters in the capital city of Mongolia. His wife is unemployed. He has been running a renting business in a public apartment. So far, he rents rooms to six families. The business has been successful and now he is planning to rent the garage of the building to a furniture factory. But the room needs to be repaired a bit to make it more comfortable. Batzorig is a hardworking man who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by renting the garage so that I could raise the family income. I recognize that I have to be responsible for the family finance". The total amount he is requesting is 1,500,000 MNT to facelift the garage.

loans.use: To give the garage a facelift before renting it

loans.name: 3 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
Silvia cuenta 23 años de edad, es casada tiene un hijo que esta estudiando 5° de primaria su esposo se llama Alfredo es campesino, ella se dedica al comercio tiene una tienda productos de abarrotes ya tiene con su negocio 3 años lo cual dice que le esta funcionando muy bien.
Silvia vive en una comunidad muy tranquila y su tienda la tiene en su casa así que sus clientes son sus vecinas, ella espera que le vaya muy bien con el negocio ya que le gustaría que creciera mas pero dice que ahora lo esta sacándolo adelante pues necesita de inversión, es por ello qie ella invertirá su préstamo en la compra de aceites, refrescos, jugos, leche, huevos, azúcar, fríjol, arroz, etc. Esta muy agradecida con su préstamo ya que éste le va a dar un gran empuje a su negocio.

Silvia pertenece al grupo 3 de mayo cuyo nombre es el nombre de la calle de donde vive el grupo esta integrado por 7 mujeres y 6 hombres en total 13 personas comprometidas con el trabajo a continuación serán mencionadas Rodolfo, Zurita, Andrés, Saturnino, Paciano, Inocencia, Mauro, Jovita, Alma, Victoria, Daniel, Emiliana, todos cuenta con una actividad comercial como son: venta de productos de abarrotes, maíz, ropa, carnicería, venta de pollo, refrescos, comida, dulces, frutas, etc.
texts.en:
Silvia, 23, is married and has a son attending fifth grade.  Her husband’s name is Alfredo and he’s a farmer.  She’s a merchant; she has had a grocery store for three years that she says is doing very well.

Silvia lives in a very tranquil community and her store is located at home so her customers are neighbors.  She hopes to do well with the business because she’d like it to grow more but she says that she’s moving it forward at present because she needs the investment and this is why she will use her loan to buy oil, soft-drinks, juice, milk, eggs, sugar, beans, rice, etc.  She’s very grateful for her loan because it’s going to give her business a strong push.

Silvia belongs to the “3 de Mayo” group.  Its name is the street where the members of the group live.  It has 7 women and 6 men, a total of 13 people committed to work who are listed as follows:  Rodolfo, Zurita, Andrés, Saturnino, Paciano, Inocencia, Mauro, Jovita, Alma, Victoria, Daniel and Emiliana.  They each have their own activity such as: the sale of groceries, corn, clothes, butcher shop, chicken sales, soft-drinks, food, candy, fruit, etc.

loans.use: to buy oil, soft-drinks, juice, milk, eggs, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Nozim

texts.ru: Нозим житель города Исфара. Ему 42 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Нозим занимается торговлей. Он арендует помещение, где открыл продуктовый магазин. Этим видом деятельности Нозим занимается 13 лет. В торговле ему помогает жена. Он берет кредит для приобретения кондитерских изделий.
texts.en: Nozim is a resident of the city of Isfara.  He is 42 years old, married and has two children.  Nozim is involved in sales.  He leases a space, where he opened a food market.  Nozim has been involved in this business for 13 years.  His wife helps him with the sales.  He is requesting this loan to buy confectionery goods.

loans.use: to buy confectionery goods

loans.name: Davlatbek

texts.ru: Давлатбек житель района Дж. Руми. Он продолжает свою деятельность и берет кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Davlatbek is a resident of the J. Rumy district.  He continues his business and requests this loan to buy bulls and calves.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves

loans.name: John Lester

texts.en: John Lester, a 25-year-old single man who lives in the Philippines, has been providing motorela or motorcycle services for three years. A member of HSPFI since 2011, he is requesting a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy tools and gasoline for his service. In the future, John Lester hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase tools and gasoline for his transport service.

loans.name: Muharram

texts.ru: Мухаррам проживает в городе Худжанд. Ей 57 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Она имеет среднее образование. Три года как Мухаррам занимается торговлей. Она у себя во дворе продает лук оптом. Кредит берет для покупки лука.
texts.en: Muharram lives in the city of Khujand.  She is 57 years old, married and has two children.  She has a secondary education.  Muharram has been involved in sales for three years.  She sells onions wholesale in her yard.  She is requesting this loan to buy onions.

loans.use: to buy onions

loans.name: Grover Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Grover es cliente antiguo que trabaja como jardinero en un hotel cinco estrellas de la ciudad de la paz, desde hace tiempo y en domicilios particulares donde hace mantenimiento de los jardines, vive en la casa de sus suegros con su esposa Ángela ella es enfermera, no tienen hijos ambos trabajan, el Sr. Grover hace fumigados para el mantenimiento de jardinería trabaja independientemente con los fumigados en domicilios particulares,  El sr. Grover recientemente se compro un vehículo al cual se le hizo  mantenimiento ya que lo pondrá a trabajar, ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de llantas y fungicidas para su negocio, razón por lo que solicita el crédito, es una persona trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Grover is a former client who has been working as a gardener in a five star hotel and in private homes in La Paz.  He lives in his in-laws' home with his wife Ángela, who is a nurse. They do not have children and both of them work. Grover works independently when spraying for pests while caring for the private gardens.  

Grover recently bought a car that needed repairs so that it would run properly. Now he needs and is requesting a loan to purchase tires and pesticides for his business. He is a hardworking man who is grateful to the institution for the support offered to him.

loans.use: to buy tires and pesticides.

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en: Otgonbayar is a 42-year-old man who lives with his wife and four children in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. His children study at college and high school. He has been running a meat retailing business for five years. He purchases the meats from a herder or herder families and his wife sells the meat at the Trade Center in their town. The business has been successful. Due to the price increases, they need to buy the meat in large quantities. Otgonbayar is a good-natured man who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the meats in large quantities before they price increases". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy meat.

loans.use: To buy meat to sell

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en: Thelma, a 36-year-old married mother of two, lives in the Philippines where she has operated a business providing motorela or motorcycle services, with her husband as the driver, for the past five years. A new member of HSPFI, Thelma is requesting a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy tools and gasoline for the business. In the future, she hopes to improve her enterprise.

loans.use: to buy tools and gasoline for her transportation service.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр житель города Худжанд. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Бахтиёр занимается скотоводством. В этой области он 12 лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a resident of the city of Khujand.  He is 40 years old, married and has two children.  Bakhtiyor is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for 12 years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves in order to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Igualdad Group

texts.es:
la señora Soledad es uno de los 11 integrantes de un grupo llamado igualdad el cual se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de tetela la cual se caracteriza por estar ubicada en una zona cañera en el estado de Oaxaca, la mayoria de sus habitantes se dedican a la siembra y cultivo de caña ya que a solo 15 minutos de encuantra el ingenio la margarita uno de los principales productores de azucar de la region.
Doña Soledad tiene la edad de 52 años estudio hasta la secundaria y es madre soltera de un joven de 22 años que estudia la universidad , Doña soledad desde hace un poca mas de 22 años  se dedica la venta de antojitos mexicanos y comida corrida en un pequño local que tiene en su hogar el cual se encuentra ubicado a la orrilla de la carretera  cerca de la parada de autobuses lo cual le ayuda a aumentar sus ventas el cual  Es un lugar perfecto para vender ya que tiene muchos clientes habituales. Ella se levanta temprano para iniciar con su venta . Todo el mundo la conoce ya que tiene muy buen zason y la atencion que brinda.

doña Soledad necesita el préstamo para comprar variedad de chiles, las tortillas, carne, tomate, cebolla, frijoles, sal, aceite, gaseosas, ajo, cilantro y platos desechables para continuar con sus ventas.

ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio continue progresando ya que le gustaria a futuro remodelar su negocio para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes


los demas integrantes de este grupo son:

Maria venta de antojitos mexicanos
Reyna venta de comida
cesarea venta de cosmeticos
magdalena reposteria
guadalupe refresqueria
matilde venta de antojitos 
martha venta de ropa 
Guadalupe venta de calzado 
alicia venta de antojitos 
salvador simbra y cultivo de caña
texts.en:
Soledad is one of the 11 members of a group called Igualdad in the community of Tetela, in a sugarcane-growing area in the state of Oaxaca.  The majority of the residents work growing sugarcane, because only 15 minutes away is Ingenio La Margarita, one of the main sugar producers in the region.

Soledad, 52, studied up to secondary school and is the single mother of a 22-year-old who studies in the university.  For a little more than 22 years Soledad has sold Mexican "antojitos" [traditional corn-based foods] and daily specials in a small place she has in her home, which is located on the side of the highway near a bus stop.  This helps her increase her sales.  It is a perfect place to sell because there are many regular customers.  She gets up early to start with her sales.  Everybody knows her because of the seasoning and the service she offers.

Soledad needs the loan to buy a variety of chiles and tortillas, meat, tomatoes, onions, beans, salt, oil, sodas, garlic, cilantro, and disposable plates to continue with her sales.  She hopes that with this investment her business will continue progressing, because in the future she would like to remodel to give her customers better service.

The other members of this group are María, who sells Mexican antojitos; Reyna, who sells food; Cesárea, who sells cosmetics; Magdalena, who bakes pastries; Guadalupe, who sells beverages; Matilde, who sells antojitos; Martha, who sells clothing; Guadalupe, who sells footwear; Alicia, who sells antojitos; and Salvador, who grows sugar cane.

loans.use: to buy a variety of chiles and tortillas, meat, tomatoes, onions, beans, salt, oil, sodas, garlic, cilantro, and disposable plates.

loans.name: Galsanpuntsag

texts.en: Galsanpuntsag is a 36-year-old man who lives with his wife and three children in Bayanhongor province in Southern Mongolia. His wife is employed. He has been running a goldsmith business since 2005. He had prior experience running a food market. His wife has been trained at the center and now has a sewing business in his workplace. They are working hard to raise more for the children and their future. Galsanpuntsag is a diligent man who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the necessary materials for the sewing business". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy sewing materials for his wife's business.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials for his wife's business

loans.name: Shatarchuluun

texts.en: Shatarchuluun is 40 years old and lives with his daughter in Uvurhangai province in Central province. He has been running a taxi service business since 2008. The business has been profitable and successful. He is a contracted driver with the local big hotel. He receives guests and delivers people. He owns a car named 'excel'. The van has five seats. But, due to the unpaved roads in the coutryside, he needs to repair the car and change some spare parts on it. He is planning to have this loan and use it for the repairs because this is the only economic source for him and his college girl. Shatarchuluun is a hardworking man who says, "I would like to continue the business activity by repairing my car". The total amount he is requesting is 300,000 MNT to buy spare parts for his car.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his car

loans.name: Tuya

texts.en: Tuya is 39 years old and lives with her husband and daughter in Arhangai province in Central Mongolia. Her husband is employed and her daughter studies at college. She has been running a meat retail business for 10 years. She has made many regular customers and suppliers during these times. The business has been successful and she makes a good deal with the customers and the suppliers. Tuya is a nice woman who says, "I would like to expand my business activities by buying beef in large quantities at wholesale so that I could raise the income and improve household". The total amount she is requesting is 900,000 MNT to buy beef.

loans.use: To buy beef

loans.name: Zulkhumor

texts.ru: Зулхумор замужем имеет одного ребенка. У них дружная семья. Муж предприниматель. Зулхумор на протяжении 16 лет занимается купле продажей мужской одежды и обуви. С наступлением весны она хочет расширить ассортимент своего товара. В 2010 году она получила первый займ в ИМОН. Займ помог ей в расширении бизнеса. Она хотела бы получить займ для покупки летней одежды и обуви с целью расширения своего бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Zulkhumor is married and has one child.  She has a friendly family.  Her husband is an entrepreneur.  Zulkhumor has been involved in buying and selling men's clothing and shoes for 16 years.  With the onset of spring, she wants to expand her merchandise selection.  She obtained her first loan from IMON in 2010.  That loan helped her with expanding the business.  Zulkhumor wants to obtain this loan to buy summer clothing and shoes in order to expand her business.  She relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes

loans.name: Sagyn

texts.ru:
Сагын 54 года, вдова, имеет 2 детей. 25 лет назад Сагын  начала заниматся животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 5,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время хозяйство Сагын насчитывает 2 дойных коров и 1 лошадь и приносит  около 4,000 сом (KGS)   в месяц от продажи молока  и молочных продуктов.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сагын обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп бычков на откорм и перепродажу.  Доходы от кредита Сагын планирует вложить в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Sagyn is 54 years old, a widow and has two children.  She became involved in animal husbandry 25 years ago, having started this business with an initial sum of 5,000 som (KGS).  At the present time, Sagyn's business contains two dairy cows and one horse, and yields about 4,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Sagyn requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy bulls for fattening up and resale.  She plans to invest the earning from the loan into expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es: El Joven Samuel tiene 24 años y es soltero se dedica  a la  elaboración de Chicha de maíz y maní, se dedica  a esta actividad hace un año, el vive en la zona de el morro, Este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución, Samuel  utilizara este préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio, la  razón para solicitar este préstamo es no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para adquirir lo necesario. Samuel enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el precio de los insumos para la elaboración de estos refrescos  es alta y  va a utilizar los beneficios del crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de maíz (wiñapu), su deseo para el es que su negocio sea estable y rentable, Samuel es un joven trabajador y emprendedor se siente feliz y agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Samuel is 24 years old and single.  He makes corn and peanut Chicha, and has been doing this for one year.  He lives in the El Morro area.  This loan is his first with the bank.  He does not have enough money to purchase what he needs.  His business faces challenges because the price of the ingredients needed for these soft drinks is high.  He will use this loan to purchase corn (wiñapu).  He hopes to see his business become stable and profitable.  Samuel is a hardworking and entrepreneurial young man.  He is happy and thankful for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, corn and peanuts, for making Chicha.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with seven children. 

Lydia has a shop that sells frozen foods, dried fish &  homemade sausage or chorizo. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 to buy stocks of frozen foods, dried fish & ingredients for making sausage.

Lydia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Lydia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods, dried fish & ingredients for making sausage

loans.name: Abdukarim

texts.ru: Абдукарим женат имеет четверых детей. Семья большая. На содержание семьи уходит много средств и для этого он много работает. Он хочет содержать свою семью в хороших условиях. На рынке приобретает скот откармливает и продает. Он хочет получить займ и увеличить поголовье скота. Он надеется на поддержку и милосердие добрых людей.
texts.en: Abdukarim is married and has four children.  His family is large.  A lot of resources go toward supporting the family, and Abdukarim has to work a lot to provide these.  He wants to provide good conditions for his family.  Abdukarim buys livestock at a market, fattens it up and sells it.  He wants to obtain this loan to increase livestock headcount.  He relies on the support and mercy of kind people.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Oyun

texts.en: Oyun is a 48-year-old woman who lives with her husband and two children in Arhangai province in Central Mongolia. Her husband is employed and her children study at the local secondary school. She used to sell dairy products and now she sells ice cream and mobile phone unit cards. The shop counter is located in the central hospital in the town. Her husband brings the supplies from the city and she sells them. The business activity has been normal and profitable. Oyun is a good-natured woman who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by buying a freezer for the ice cream. I plan to sell more to the school children so that I could raise the income". The total amount she is requesting is 1,500,000 MNT to buy a freezer and more ice cream from Ulaanbaatar.

loans.use: To buy a freezer and ice cream

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. 

Gemma makes & peddles snacks like pancakes & rice cakes. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients needed for making rice cakes.
 
Gemma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Gemma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed to make rice cakes

loans.name: Asmar

texts.ru: Асмар 38 лет.  Детство Асмар прошло в селе Садовом. После окончания 9 класса средней школы, согласно древней традиции (изжившей себя на сегодняшний день), ее украли замуж. Став домохозяйкой, Асмар родила троих детей и в поисках дохода для своей семьи, начала бизнес в животноводстве. Стартовав с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS), Асмар смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячным доходом 11,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На сегодняшний день, в хозяйстве Асмар имеется 2 головы дойных коров и 1 лошадь и в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асмар обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Асмар планирует вложить  обучение сына, который учится в техникуме, а в дальнейшем - в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Asmar is 38 years old.  Her childhood was spent in the Sadovoe village.  After finishing ninth grade of the secondary school and according to an ancient tradition (which outlived itself today), she was stolen for marriage.  Having become a homemaker, Asmar gave birth to three children and, in search of a source of income for her family, started a business in animal husbandry.  Having started with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS), Asmar was able to develop her business to have a monthly income of 11,000 som (KGS) from sales of milk and milk products.  Today her business contains two dairy cows and one horse.  In order to further develop her business, Asmar requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into educating her son, who attends a technical college, and into expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Fredy Mauricio

texts.es:
FREDY MAURICIO tiene 27 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en San Miguel de Bolívar.

Freddy Mauricio se dedica a realizar arreglos Florales, tiene un local de flores. Solicita el crédito para comprar flores, rosas, margaritas, iluciones. Con la yuad del crédito podra aumentar la mercadería.

Las compras las realizaran en Ambato cada semana y las ventas lo hace en San Miguel. 

El sueño es comprarse un vehículo. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son la competencia en el negocio. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión
texts.en:
Fredy Mauricio, 27, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in San Miguel de Bolívar.  Fredy Mauricio works making flower arrangements.  He has a flower shop.

He is requesting the loan to buy flowers, roses, daisies, and baby's breath.  With the help of the loan he will be able to increase his merchandise.

He will make his purchases in Ambato every week, and he makes his sales in San Miguel.

His dream is to buy himself a vehicle.  The challenge he faces is competition in the business.  In his free time he likes to watch television.

loans.use: to buy flowers, roses, daisies, and baby's breath.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les neuf femmes du groupe Danaya ont  en moyenne 37 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Cinzara dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de mariage et de parenté. Elles font essentiellement l’achat et la vente de laits sous toutes ses formes. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1er prêt solidaire.
Madame, Djeneba (1ère assise à droite sur la photo) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 300 litres de lait frais auprès des coopératives de éleveurs de San. Après  avoir bouillie le lait, elle vend au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Djeneba espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 60.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
The nine members of the Danaya group are married women living in extended traditional families. On average, they are 37 years old and they have five children each. They live in the village of Cinzara, in Ségou (fourth administrative region of Mali), and they know each other as neighbors and through ties of marriage and kinship. They buy and sell all types of milk.

To increase their working capital, the group members joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution. This is their first group loan. 

Mrs. Djeneba (sitting first from the right) plans to use her loan to buy 300 liters of fresh milk from the farmers’ co-ops of San. She boils the milk and sells it at retail for cash or credit to a clientele consisting of both men and women.

Mrs. Djeneba hopes that this loan will help her to earn an average monthly profit of 60,000 CFAF, which she will reinvest in her activity and use to cover the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les neuf femmes du groupe Djiguiya ont  en moyenne 38 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Cinzara dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de mariage et de parenté. Elles font essentiellement l’achat et la vente de laits sous toutes ses formes. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1er prêt solidaire.
Madame, Malado (2 eme assise de la droite vers la gauche) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 150 litres de lait frais auprès des coopératives de éleveurs de San. Après  avoir bouillie le lait, elle vend au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame   Malado  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All married and in large traditional families, the nine women of the Djiguiya group are on average 38 years old with 4 children. They all live in the village of Cinzara in the region of Ségou (4th administrative region of Mali) and met through neighborhood, marriage and family ties. They buy and sell milk in all its forms.

With the goal of increasing their business, the members of the group are on their first loan in solidarity with Soro Yiriwaso. Madam Malado (the second seated person from right to left) plans to use her loan to buy 150 litres of fresh milk from the cooperatives of breeders in San. After having boiled the milk, she sells retail for cash and credit to a clientèle that consists of men and women. With this loan, Madam Malado hopes to make an average monthly profit of 35,000 FCFA which will be used to reinvest in her business and take care of the needs of her home.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase onions, garlic, salt and cooking pots

loans.name: Rosevic

texts.en:
Rosevic is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. 

Rosevic has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Rosevic has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Rosevic hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Virgen del carmen esta conformado por  doce  integrantes  todos son personas trabajadoras con deseos de superarse y triunfar en la vida.
Son originarios de  pinotepa nacional donde se  bailan las chilenas tierra de gente indígena.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la señora  Juliana una señora trabajadora y humilde alegre y platicadora, se dedica a la venta de pescado y de bimbuñuelos  ella nos dice que los binbuñuelos solo los vende en las fechas de diciembre.
Los pescado que ella vende se llaman: robalo, pargo, carpa, tichinda y jaiba doña Juliana compra sus pescados por kilos cada tercer día compra  sesenta kilos de pescado surtido.
Ella nos dice que se va  a vender con su esposo Baltasar  a los pueblos vecinos de la comunidad don Baltasar le deja en un pueblo que se llama Jicayan y el se va a vender a san Juanito y santiaguito cuando el termina de vender  pasa por Jicayan   y los dos ya se regresan para su casa.
Doña Juliana tiene  cinco hijos Baltasar de veinte dos años, Antonio de veinte un años, víctor  de  quince años, Elena Edith de diecisiete años y oscar de catorce años, ellos también a su mama acompañándola a vender cundo tiene días libres.
Doña Juliana  nos cuenta  todo su pescado lo vende en un solo día  ya que  sus clientas le hacen pedidos y ellas las recomienda ya que  en ocasiones les regala un pescado para que le alcance para su caldo.
Doña Juliana  pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas pescado para la venta como es : tichinda,jaiva,robalo,pargo,carpa y ti chinda ,  nos dice que esta contenta por su negocio y  por todas las bendiciones que le ha dado dios para  que le vaya  bien en su negocio .
Esta muy agradecida con fundacion por querer ayudar a la gente  trabajadora y cambiar su vida.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Victorina- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Baltazar – se dedica al servicio de taxi.
Mayra Cristina - se dedica a la venta de dulces.
Juliana- se dedica a la venta de refrescos.
Verónica- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Virgen Dalia- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Laura Cristian- se dedica a la venta de comida.
Crisanta- se dedica a la venta de  mercancía de abarrotes.
Lucia Edith - se dedica a la venta de plásticos.
Dominga – se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Felicitas se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.

Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudar a la gente buena e indígena con deseos de superarse y darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
This group Virgen del Carmen is composed of twelve members, all of whom are hard-working people with the desire to improve themselves and to triumph in life. 

They are natives of Pinotepa Nacional, where the chilena is danced, land of indigenous people.

One of the members of the group is Juliana, a hardworking, humble, happy, and talkative woman, who makes her living selling fish and bimbunuelos (a crispy wheel-shaped pastry). She tells us that she only sells bimbunuelos in December. The types of fish she sells include: sea bass, snapper, carp, clams, y crab. Juliana buys her fish by the kilo. Every third day she buys sixty kilos of assorted fish.

She tells us that she goes to sell with her husband Baltasar in neighboring towns. Baltasar leaves her in a town called Jicayan while he goes to sell in San Juan and Santiago. When he finishes, he passes through Jicayan and the two of them return to their house. Juliana has five children: Baltasar is twenty-two years old, Antonio is twenty, Victor is fifteen, Elena Edith is seventeen, and Oscar is fourteen. They also accompany their mother to sell when they have days off.

Juliana tells us that she sells all her fish in a single day, so her clients place orders. Since they recommend her, she occasionally gives them a fish so that they have enough left over for broth.

Juliana requested the loan in order to buy more fish to sell, including clams, crabs, sea bass, snapper, and carp. She tells us that she is content with her business and with all the blessings God has given her so that she can succeed in her business.

She is very grateful to the foundation for wanting to help hardworking people and to change their lives.

The other members of the group are:
Victorina-makes a living selling Mexican antojitos (Mexican snacks bought at street stands)
Baltazar-makes a living from his taxi service
Mayra Cristina-makes a living selling candy
Juliana-makes a living selling soft drinks
Verónica-makes a living selling clothes
Virgen Calia-makes a living selling clothes
Laura Cristian-makes a living selling food
Crisanta-makes a living selling groceries
Lucia Edith-makes a living selling plastics
Dominga-makes a living selling antojitos
Felicitas-makes a living selling antojitos

They give thanks to the foundations for helping good and indigenous people who want to improve themselves and give their families better lives.

loans.use: to buy fish for sale.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Rodolfo invirtió su anterior credikiva en mercancía y surtió su negocio, así fue como  no faltó el arroz, azúcar, café, aceite, productos que mucho rotan  y esto fue gracias a su credikiva. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento, para continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, pues teniendo inventario de víveres, carnes y abarrotes, lo cual va a comprar,  su clientela estará satisfecha y muy pronto volverán. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente; “Ante todo gracias a Dios porque hoy en día hay personas como ustedes, que apoyan a otros para cumplir objetivos en la vida. “
texts.en: Rodolfo invested his prior Kiva loan in merchandise to stock his business. Thanks to his Kiva loan, he was not out of rice, sugar, coffee, oil, and other products that turn quickly. He is now applying for new financing to increase his working capital, as he is going to purchase more inventory of foodstuffs, meats, and grocery items. His customers will be satisfied and return soon. His message to the Kiva lenders is: “First, thanks to God because today there are people like you who help others achieve their goals in life."

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs, meats, and grocery items.

loans.name: Miguel  Francisco

texts.es: Miguel de 69 años de edad vive al sur occidente de la ciudad,  con su cónyuge y tiene  2 hijos en las edades de 38 y 42 años. Allí en su propio barrio tiene un negocio de venta de alimentos, que funciona en un pequeño local, desde hace un año, su producto principal es el almuerzo, el cual vende al detal ,  a conductores de motocicletas que circulan en el sector y habitantes cercanos a su negocio que adquieren sus productos al detal diariamente. Su meta mas adelante, es hacer adecuaciones al local para ampliarlo y aumentar la cantidad de mesas, pues en las horas de mayor circulación de sus clientes, se convierten en un desafío lograr atenderlos a todos con mayor comodidad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará carne, yuca, verduras, papa entre otros insumos para aumentar su oferta, e incrementar el volumen de sus ventas.
texts.en: Miguel, who is 69 years old, lives southwest of the city with his wife.  He has 2 children who are 38 and 42 years old.  He has a business selling food in his neighborhood.  He has a small store front.  For about a year, his main product has been lunch, which he sells directly to the consumer, mainly motorcycle drivers whose routes are in his area and people who live nearby and purchase his products on a daily basis.  His goal down the line is to fix up his shop, to expand it and increase the number of tables.  During the busiest times, it becomes a challenge to tend to all his customers comfortably.  Currently, Miguel is applying for a credikiva, his first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which he will purchase meat, yucca, vegetables, potatoes and other supplies to add to what he can offer and increase his sales volume.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies like meats, tubers and general vegetables.

loans.name: Eugenio Erasmo

texts.es:
Eugenio tiene 54 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de mala, ciudad que se caracteriza por la agricultura, en especial por el cultivo de frutales como el plátano maleño y la vid, también tiene un clima cálido y acogedor y sobre todo conocido por la amabilidad de sus pobladores y sus hermosas playas. Eugenio es un hombre muy trabajador con un espíritu humilde; aun está soltero y el nos comenta que todavía no ha llegado a su vida su media naranja pero que no se entristece por eso. Desde hace 7 años trabaja en su negocio como chofer de taxi, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias, se levanta muy temprano para poder iniciar sus labores ya que aprovecha en horas de la mañana para transportar a los clientes que se van sus trabajos  y a los escolares que van a su colegio; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amble con los clientes y sobre todo siempre es precavido cuando conduce por ello los clientes tienen confianza en él.

Eugenio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá hacer trabajaos de mejoramiento de su vivienda, en especial tarrajeo de paredes y enchapado; así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
Eugenio is 54 years old.  He lives in the city of Mala, a city known for agriculture, especially for fruit crops such as banana and grapevines.  The climate is warm and welcoming.  Above all, the city is known for the friendliness of its residents and its beautiful beaches.  Eugenio is a very hard working man with a humble attitude.  He is still single and tells us that that his other half still hasn't appeared in his life, but he doesn't get down about it.  

For the past 7 years, he has worked as a taxi driver.  He works around 10 hours per day.  He gets up very early to start work and takes advantage of the morning hours to transport people to their jobs and students to school.  He thinks his business is successful because he is very friendly with customers and, above all, very cautious when driving, so that his customers trust him. 

Eugenio is very thankful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the support they have provided he will be able to make improvements to his home, in particular to plaster the walls and tile work.  In this way he can improve his quality of life and continue working towards his big dream of "finishing construction of his home".

loans.use: Para mejoramiento de vivienda( tarrajeo, enchapado)

loans.name: Los  Lirios 1 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Los Lirios  1 esta conformado por ocho  mujeres trabajadoras e indígenas originarias de pinotepa nacional Oaxaca tierra de gente buena  con deseos de superarse y lograr sus sueños.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora  Paula una señora trabajadora y amable de  treinta y cuatro años de edad, se dedica a la venta antojitos mexicanos como es  sopes, quesadillas, entomatadas, enchiladas y empanadas de pollo.
Doña Pau como mejor la conocen sus compañeras  nos cuenta que desde hace un año se ha dedicado ala venta de antojitos mexicanos, y lo que mas le gusta de su negocio  es preparar los antojitos tener sus pedidos a tiempo y darle una buena atención a sus clientes.
Doña Pau esta felizmente casada con el señor Cornelio Javier de cuarenta años de edad, doña Pau nos cuenta  que esta muy contenta  con su negocio y con sus hijos  Ángel Javier de diecisiete años de edad, Cornelio de dieciséis años de edad, Paulo de doce años de edad, Cristina  de doce años de edad y Gustavo de siete años de edad.
Doña Pau nos dice que fundacion le  ha cambiado la vida ya que antes lavaba ropa ajena y le dolía mucho la espalda  pero gracias al apoyo de fundacion de fundacion  ya tiene su pequeño negocio y obtiene buenas ganancias.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más ingredientes para la elaboración de antojitos como es: chile verdee chile seco, jitomate, cebolla, ajo, queso, quesillo y pollo.
Esta muy agradecida con fundacion por mejorar la calidad de vida de la gente que tiene deseos de superarse.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Bernardina-quien se dedica a la venta de pescado.
Irma-se dedica a la venta de postres.
Bonfilia- se dedica a la venta de  pan.
Yolanda- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Sonia Josefina- se dedica a la  venta de perfumes.
Teodora- se dedica a la venta de artículos de bisutería.
Alba- se dedica a la venta de zapatos.

Le dan las gracias a fundacion por ayudar a la gente trabajadora y humilde con deseos de mejorar su vida.
texts.en:
This group, Los Lirios 1, is composed of eight hardworking indigenous women who are natives of Pinotepa Nacional, Oaxaca: land of good people with the desire to improve themselves and achieve their dreams.

One of the members of this group is Paula, a hardworking and lovable woman of thirty-four years of age. She makes her living selling traditional Mexican snacks or "antojitos," such as soups, quesadillas, entomatadas, enchiladas, and chicken empanadas.

Paula, or "Pau," as she is better known by her group members, tells us that she has been selling Mexican antojitos for a year. What she likes most about her business is preparing the antojitos, having her orders on time, and giving her clients good service.

Pau is happily married to Cornelio Javier, who is forty years old. Pau tells us that she is very content with her business and her children. Ángel Javier is sixteen, Cornelio is sixteen, Paulo is twelve, Cristina is twelve, and Gustavo is seven.

Pau tells us that the foundation has changed her life. Before she used to take in washing and her back hurt a great deal, but thanks to the support of the foundation, she now has her own little business and makes a good living.

She requested this loan in order to buy more ingredients for the preparation of her antojitos, such as green chiles, dried chiles, tomatoes, onion, garlic, cheese, fresh cheese, and chicken.

She is very grateful to the foundation for improving the quality of life of people who want to improve themselves.

The other members of the group are:
Bernardina—who makes a living selling fish
Irma—who makes a living selling desserts
Bonfilia—who makes a living selling bread
Yolanda—who makes a living selling clothes
Sonia Josefina—who makes a living selling perfumes
Teodora—who makes a living selling articles of costume jewelry
Alba—who makes a living selling shoes

They give thanks to the foundation for helping hardworking, humble people with the desire to improve their life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is forty-three years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Nenita has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Nenita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future,Nenita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is twenty-six years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Esther has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 14,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Esther has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future,Esther hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Emee

texts.en:
Emee is thirty-seven years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Emee has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for eleven years. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Emee has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Emee hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is forty-six years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children.
 
Felisa has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Felisa has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Felisa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Chilbert

texts.en:
Chilbert is forty-five years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with three children. 

Chilbert rents out rooms in boarding houses. He has had this business for fifteen years. He requested a loan of PHP 17,000 to buy materials for the maintenance of the boarding houses.

Chilbert has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Chilbert hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy materials for the maintenance of his boarding houses.

loans.name: Rizalito

texts.en:
Rizalito is forty-two years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with four children. 

Rizalito has a shop that makes and sells rice cakes or bibingka. He has had this business for fifteen years. He requested a loan of PHP 16,000 to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.

Rizalito has been a member of HSPFI since 2008. In the future, Rizalito hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.

loans.name: Doni -Doni Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les sept femmes du groupe Doni -Doni ont  en moyenne 36 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Sienso dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font l’achat et la vente de poissons, de  céréales, d’habits, de condiments alimentaires, des fruits et légumes et de la restauration. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  3 eme  prêt solidaire. Les deux prêts  précédents ont été remboursés sans aucune difficulté.
Madame, Alimata (2ème femme debout de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) est une grande restauratrice dans le village de Sienso et ses environnants. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 2 sacs de mil et un colis de condiments alimentaires à la foire de San. Après préparation de ses plats alimentaires, elle vend au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Alimata espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All married and in large traditional families, the seven women of the Doni-Doni group are on average 36 years old with 4 children. They all live in the village of Sienso in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of Mali) and met through neighborhood and family ties. They buy and sell fish, cereals, clothing, food condiments, fruit and vegetables and do catering.

With the goal of increasing their business, the members of the group joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their third group loan. The two previous loans were repaid without any difficulty. Madam Alimata (the second standing woman from right to left on the photo) is a great caterer in the village of Sienso and its surroundings.

She plans to use her loan to buy 2 bags of mil [African cereal] and a parcel of food condiments at the fair in San. After preparing her dishes, she sells them retail for cash and credit to a clientèle consisting of men and women. With this loan, Madam Alimata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 15,000 FCFA which will be used to reinvest in her business and to take care of the needs of her home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for catering.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.en:
Jose Maria is thirty years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children. 

Jose Maria provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the motorcycle services.

Jose Maria has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Jose Maria hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the motorcycle services.

loans.name: Rodella

texts.en:
Rodella is fifty-nine years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Rodella has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Rodella has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Rodella hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is forty-nine years old and married with three children.

Isidra works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell.

Isidra has borrowed and paid for fifteen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Isidra aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is fifty-four years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Evelyn has a food shop or eatery that sells viands (cooked dishes) like afritada, caldereta and adobo. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy raw ingredients needed for making viands.

Evelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Evelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making viands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Tsatsa's Buleg Group

texts.en:
Tsatsral is a twenty-nine-year-old young lady entrepreneur who has two children, who are two and four years old. Both of them attend kindergarten. Her family lives in their own ger, a traditional Mongolian felt tent, which is located in the outer ger district (a district without basic infrastructure) of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.

Tsatsral has been supporting her family by operating a clothing retail stall at Mongolia's largest outdoor market for six years, with the help of her spouse. She usually sells women's clothes, which she imports from Ereen, a border city between Mongolia and China. As she is a friendly person, she already has her own constant customers. Tsatsral wants to expand her business in order to increase her working capital. 

So she is requesting a 1,800,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase clothes from Ereen city to sell during this high shopping season. Her long-term goal is to improve her living conditions by renovating her current small ger.

She is a group leader and she has her hand up in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for the upcoming season.

loans.name: Edison Ivan

texts.es:
Edison, es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y ferviente creyente de Dios, el es un hombre que tiene 4 pequeños, los cuales acuden al nivel primario en el colegio, su esposa es su mejor acompañante, amiga y guía, ya que juntos han atravesado muchas cosas y han aprendido que juntos son capaces de lograr grandes cosas.

Edison estudió Mecánica de Producción hace unos años, esto lo llevo a poder incentivarse a sí mismo a dedicarse a la cerrajería, actividad que realiza diariamente. El trabaja un promedio de 6 horas diarias en su propio negocio, debido a que en las mañanas trabaja en un taller de soldadura. Estos dos trabajos le permiten ganar el dinero que necesita para mantener a su familia.

Gracias al apoyo que se le está brindando, Edison podrá realizar la compra de algunos materiales que son básicos para su cerrajería, tales como fierros y otro tipo de productos. El está seguro que gracias a este apoyo el podrá juntar ahorrar dinero para poder iniciar su negocio de fabricación de accesorios para moto, de este modo llegará a cumplir su gran sueño “Tener una factoría y que sus pequeños tengan las comodidades básicas”
texts.en:
Edison is a very hardworking and honorable man, and a passionate believer in God.  He has four young children in elementary school.  His wife is his best partner, friend, and guide, because they have gone through many things and learned that together they are capable of achieving great things.

Edison studied machine operation a few years ago.  This led him to take the initiative of working in locksmithing, a job he does daily.  He works an average of six hours a day in his own business, because in the morning he works in a welding shop.  These two jobs allow him to earn the money he needs to support his family.

Thanks to the support that is being given to him, Edison will be able to buy some basic materials for locksmithing, such as pieces of metal and other types of products.

He is sure that, thanks to this help, he will be able to get together the money to be able to start his business making motorcycle accessories.  In this way he will come to realize his big dream, "To have a factory and for his little ones to have the basic comforts."

loans.use: to buy materials (pieces of metal, among others).

loans.name: Ma. Roselyn

texts.en:
Ma. Roselyn is twenty-eight years old and married with two children.

Ma. Roselyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Ma. Roselyn has borrowed and paid for eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari sari store for four years and also earns an income from buying and selling livestock.

Ma. Roselyn aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Macrina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Macrina works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from "nipa" making. Macrina is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant business.

Macrina has been sustaining her business activities through her past fifteen loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Reina

texts.en:
Reina works hard to support her family. Reina is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

Reina requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her business.

Reina has been in this business for ten years now.

In the future, Reina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Aniceta

texts.en:
Aniceta works hard to support her family. Aniceta is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Aniceta requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her business.

Aniceta has been in this business for twenty years now.

In the future, Aniceta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional materials for her business.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is forty years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Cristina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Cristina has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft drinks, spices etc.

In the future Cristina would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Gregoria Esperanza

texts.es:
Gregoria es una señora de 61 años que a través de los años ha demostrado ser una mujer fuerte y luchadora que ha criado sola a sus 8 hijos, después de que sufrió la pérdida de su amado esposo.  Ella se dedicaba a la venta de abarrotes y bebidas, pero lamentablemente su hijo cayó gravemente enfermo y estando sola con sus pequeños tuvo que dedicarse solo a su hijo, ella compró todas las medicinas que su hijo necesitaba y pagaba las consultas médicas, poco a poco fue perdiendo su bodega, ya que no tenía tiempo para atenderla y solo lo poco que ganaba lo usaba pasa su pequeño hijo.

Tras este gran reto y la mejora de su hijo, ella decidió empezar de nuevo, pero al ver que su bodega ya no tenía nada y no tenía mucho dinero para poder comprar más productos, decidió empezar a vender chanfainita los fines de semana, ella tiene que levantarse muy temprano para realizar las compras necesarias y desde luego dar lo mejor de sí para que sus plato le salgan deliciosos. Gregoria también se dedica a la venta de frutas de estación, es por ello que actualmente está vendiendo Magos y Pacaes, lo que le genera un dinero extra.

Gregoria ha solicitado nuestro apoyo con el fin de cumplir su gran sueño “Abrir nuevamente su bodega”, para ello desea poder comprar arroz, azúcar, papeles, servilletas, café, leche, entre otras cosas, que le permitirán tener esa gran bodega que tenía, así se sentirá muy contenta con ella misma y desde luego podrá mejorar su calidad de vida, para que sus hijos se sientan orgullosos de ella y continúen siendo independientes y apoyándola como siempre.
texts.en:
Gregoria is 61 years old. Over the years she has proven herself to be a strong woman, a fighter who raised 8 children alone after suffering the loss of her beloved husband.  She used to sell groceries and drinks, but unfortunately her son became gravely ill.  She was alone with her small children and had to dedicate herself to her son.  She bought all of the medicine that her son needed and paid for the doctor's visits.  Bit by bit her business fell apart, because she didn't have time to work there and the little money that she made she used for her young son.  

After this large challenge, and her son's recovery, she decided to start over. Her shop no longer had anything to sell, and she didn't have much money to purchase more products, so she decided to sell chanfainita (a Peruvian dish) on the weekends.  She has to get up very early to shop for what she needs and of course has to give her best so that her dishes are delicious.
