Georgia also sells seasonal fruit, so she is currently selling mangoes and pacay fruit, which brings in a little extra money. 

Gregoria has requested our support to help her achieve her dream of reopening her grocery store.  For this reason she need to purchase rice, sugar, paper towels, napkins, coffee, milk, etc. so that she can have the great shop she had before. This will make her very content and she will be able to improve her quality of life so that her children are proud of her and continue to be independent and supportive, as always.

loans.use: to reopen her grocery store and purchase rice, sugar, napkins, coffee, milk, etc.

loans.name: Manchita

texts.en:
Manchita works hard to support her family. Manchita is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Manchita requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts to maintain her motorcycle. 

Manchita has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Manchita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy spare parts to maintain her motorcycle.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is fifty-two years old and married with six children.

Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell.

Delia has borrowed and paid for seventeen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport and entertainment (videoke) rental.

Delia aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional items to sell.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria, 45 years old, is married and has 5 children, 3 of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 10 years, Gloria has operated a business buying and selling vegetables and spices in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell. In the future, Gloria would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean, 30 years old, is married and has 6 children, 5 of them in school. Jean works very hard to provide for her family. For the past 3 years, Jean has operated a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell. In the future Jean would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Pablita's Group

texts.en:
Pablita is the leader of a two-person group, Although they borrow as a group, each member has her own business.

Pablita is married and has 4 children. She is 60 years old and lives in Kinangay Norte, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. For the past 30 years, Pablita has operated a general store. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase canned goods, soft drinks and sacks of rice for her business. Pablita has been a member of PMPC for 5 months. In the future, she hopes to be successful in her chosen business.

loans.use: To purchase canned goods and soft drinks

loans.name: Lodrina

texts.en:
Lodrina is fifty-eight years old and widowed with ten children.

Lodrina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries etc. in her sari-sari store.

Lodrina has borrowed and paid for five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twelve years and also earns an income from farming vegetables and raising chickens and fish vending.

Lodrina aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Antonio Jr.

texts.en:
Antonio Jr is from Western Pob. Lopez Jaena. He is thirty-six years old, married, and has two children. To make a living, Antonio Jr owns and operates a fishing business, harvesting and selling wild-caught fish in the local community. He has been in this business for three years and earns PHP 8,000 monthly. 

In 2009, Antonio Jr joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. He is requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand it

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment including hooks and nets .

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela is sixty-three years old and married with one child. She is borrowing 50,000 PHP through NWTF to buy stock to sell.

Angela has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, liquor, canned goods, snack foods, eggs, etc. 

In the future Angela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy stock to sell.

loans.name: Juliebeth

texts.en: Juliebeth, 41 years old, is married and has 2 children, one of them in school. Juliebeth works very hard to provide for her family. For the past 10 years, Juliebeth has operated a sari-sari (general store) in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as sardines, noodles, snack foods, etc. She has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items such as shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her store. In the future, Juliebeth would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru:
Анаркуль 59 лет, вдова.  20 лет назад Анаркуль начала заниматься животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 20,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время хозяйство Анаркуль  приносит  около 10,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молока  и молочных продуктов.  Также Анаркуль возделывает 3,60 га орошаемой земли, где выращивает зерновые культуры. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп бычков для откорма и перепродажи.  Доходы от кредита Анаркуль планирует вложить  в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Anarkul is 59 years old and a widow.  She became involved in animal husbandry 20 years ago, having started this business with an initial sum of 20,000 som (KGS). At the present time, Anarkul's business yields about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products.  Anarkul also works on 3.60 hectares of irrigated land, where she grows cereal crops.  In order to further develop her business, Anarkul requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy bulls for fattening up and resale. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into expanding her business further.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Lailanie

texts.en: Lailanie is married and she works hard to support her family. For the past 10 years, she has operated a dry goods business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock for her business. In the future, Lailanie would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's financial stability.

loans.use: To buy additional stock for her business

loans.name: Abdizhalil

texts.ru: Абдижалил женат имеет троих детей. Жена пенсионерка. На протяжении 27 лет он занимается  купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он закупает скот, откармливает и перепродает на рынке. Он имеет хороший доход. Для увеличения поголовья скота он хочет получить займ. Он надеется, что его поддержат и помогут в приобретении крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdizhalil is married and has three children.  His wife is a retiree.  Abdizhalil has been involved in buying and selling cattle for 27 years.  He buys livestock, fattens it up and resells it at a market.  He earns a good income.  Abdizhalil wants to obtain this loan to increase livestock headcount.  He hopes that he will be supported and helped with this purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.ru: Мавзуна умная и честная девушка, ей 21 лет. Она является студенткой 3-го курса. Она учится по специальности «бухгалтерский учет и аудит». На ровне с отличной учебой Мавзуна активно участвует на культурных мероприятиях ВУЗ-а. В будущем она хочет стать главным бухгалтером какой- нибудь организации. Мавзуна хотела бы получить займ для оплаты своего обучения. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mavzuna is a smart and honest young woman, who is 21 years old.  She is a third-year student.  She is studying accounting and financial auditing.  Along with excellent study, Mavzuna actively participates in the university's cultural events.  In the future, she wants to become an accountant at an organization.  Mavzuna wants to obtain this loan to pay for her education.  She relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Nancy Judith

texts.es:
NANCY JUDITH TIENE 29 AÑOS DE EDAD ES MADRE SOLTERA  TIENE UN HIJO, VIVE CON LOS PADRES Y EL HIJO DE 1 AÑO DE EDAD EN SAN MIGUEL DE BOLÍVAR.

NANCY ES AYUDANTE DE LOCAL DE TEJIDOS DE ALGODÓN Y LANA, SOLICITA EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR HILOS, DE LANA Y ALGODON, PARA EL PROPIO NEGOCIO. 

CON LA YUDA DEL CRÉDITO PODRÁ PONER UN NEGOCIO PROOPIO. LAS COMPRAS LAS REALIZARÁ EN SAN MIGUEL.

EL SUEÑO ES AMOBLAR EL LOCAL CON LA MAQUINARIA QUE LE HACE FALTA. lOS DESAFÍOS A LOS QUE SE ENFRENTA SON LA FALTA DE TRABAJO ESTABLE.

EN EL TIEMPO LIBRE LE GUSTA SEGUIR ARREGLANDO EL LOCAL PARA EL NUEVO NEGOCIO.
texts.en:
Nancy Judith is 29 years old and a single mother with 1 son. She lives with her parents and her 1-year-old son in San Miguel de Bolivar. Nancy works in a shop that sells items made from cotton and wool cloth. 

She is requesting a loan to buy wool and cotton thread for a business of her own.  With assistance from the loan, she will be able to start her business. She can purchase all she needs in San Miguel.

Her dream is to furnish her shop with the machinery she currently lacks. Among the challenges she faces at present are the lack of stable work. In her free time now, Nancy is preparing a shop for her new business.

loans.use: to buy wool and cotton thread to open her own shop.

loans.name: Kanou Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les cinq femmes du groupe Kanou ont  en moyenne 44 ans et 6 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Tamaro dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font l’achat et la vente de  condiments alimentaires et le commerce d’articles divers. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont adhéré  l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1 er   prêt solidaire.
Madame, Sanata (2ème femme debout de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle est très sollicitée dans le village de Tamaro et ses environnants. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 sacs d’oignons et 1 panier de   d’aubergine, 1 panier de carottes, 1 panier de poivrons et 1 panier de choux à la foire de San auprès des grossistes. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Sanata  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 30.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et  aider son conjoint dans la prise en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
The women of the Kanou group are all married, and live in traditional extended families. On average, they are 44 years old and have 6 children each. They all live in the village of Tamaro, in the Ségou region (4th administrative district of Mali). They met through connections with family and friends. The women buy and sell food condiments and miscellaneous items. 
With the goal of increasing their assets, the group members joined micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are on their first group loan.
Madame Sanata (standing, second from the left in the photo) is an accomplished seller of condiments. She is very much in demand in the village of Tamaro and the surrounding area. 
She plans to use her loan to buy 5 sacks of onions, 1 basket of eggplants, 1 basket of carrots, 1 basket of peppers and 1 basket of cabbage from wholesalers at the San fair. She sells for cash, on a retail basis and on credit to customers who are mostly women. 
With this loan, Madame Sanata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 30,000 CFA francs which she will use to re-invest in the business and to help her husband in meeting the household's needs.

loans.use: to buy food condiments.

loans.name: Martun

texts.ru:
Мартун занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в деревне Ачанан, Сюникской области, более 14 лет. На своей ферме Мартун разводит крупный рогатый скот, кур, кроликов, выращивает овощи и фрукты. Также Мартун арендует землю, на которой выращивает пшеницу. У Мартуна имеется сельскохозяйственную техника и машина, с помощью которых он предоставляет сельскохозяйственные услуги в деревнях Сюникской области.
Полученную сельскохозяйственную продукцию: овощи, фрукты, говядину, молоко, яйца и пшеницу Мартун продает своим постоянным клиентам в городе Капане. 
В сельскохозяйственный сезон, с начала весны до поздней весны, предоставление услуг с помощью сельскохозяйственной техники, приносит Мартуну хорошую прибыль.  
Мартуну 51 год,  он женат и у него четверо детей: два сына и дочери-близняшки. Одновременно с ведением сельскохозяйственного бизнеса, Мартун работает лесником в Капанском лесхозе. Жена работает в сельской общине. Старший сын Мартуна учится в Капанском Европейском колледже на втором курсе платного отделения, остальные дети учатся в школе. 
Мартуну необходим кредит на сумму 1.000.000 драм для покупки шин для трактора, удобрения и дизельного топлива.     
Благодаря сельскохозяйственному бизнесу Мартун содержит семью и платит за обучение старшего сына.
texts.en:
Martun is involved in an agricultural business in the Achanan village, Syunik region, for over 14 years.  He breeds cattle, chickens and rabbits and grows vegetables and fruits on his farm.  Martun also leases land, where he grows wheat.  He owns agricultural equipment and machinery, with the help of which he provides agricultural services in the villages of the Syunik region.  Martun sells obtained agricultural products, such as vegetables, fruits, beef, milk, eggs and wheat, to his regular customers in the city of Kapan.  During the agricultural season, from the beginning of spring to late autumn, providing services with the help of the agricultural equipment earns a good profit for Martun.
Martun is 51 years old, married and has four children: two sons and twin daughters.  Along with the running of the agricultural business, Martun works as a forest ranger in the Kapan forestry.  His wife works in the village commune.  Martun's oldest son is the second-year student of the paid department of the Kapan European College, and the rest of the children attend a school.
Martun needs a loan in the amount of 1,000,000 dram to buy tires for his tractor, fertilizers and diesel fuel.  Thanks to the agricultural business, Martun supports his family and pays for his oldest son's education.

loans.use: to buy tires for his tractor, fertilizers and fuel ahead of the sowing season

loans.name: El Girasol Group

texts.es:
Florina cuenta con 39 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene 4 hijos solo estudia uno Everardo de 22 años de edad el trabaja en el campo, Liliana de 18 años ya no estudia le ayuda a su mamá en la casa y el negocio, francisco de 17 años ya no estudia se dedica al campo y vaneli esta estudiando 5° grado de primaria, ella dice que sus hijos ya no están estudiando puesto que no tiene los recursos para siguieran estudiando pero que le ayudan a ella en la casa y en el negocio, ella se dedica al comercio vende perfumes y verduras ya tiene 3 años con el negocio, ella sale a vender ahí en su pueblo con sus vecinas lo cual dice que vende muy bien ella invertirá su préstamo en la compra de perfumes, cremas y verduras  como son: chile, jitomate, cebolla, papas, etc. Ella espera que le vaya muy bien con el negocio ya que le gustaría que incrementara más.

Florina pertenece al grupo el girasol el cual esta integrado por 10 personas 2 hombres y 8 mujeres a continuación serán mencionados: mercedes, Roselia, Noelia, Demetria, Maria, Brenda Liz, Iván, Sabas, Carlos, todos cuenta con una actividad comercial como son: verduras, perfumes, calzado por catalogo, productos de abarrotes, ventas de pollos, maíz, fríjol, cosméticos, etc.
texts.en:
Florina, 39, is a single mother of four children.  Only one of them studies, Everardo, 22; he works in the fields.  Liliana, 18, no longer studies; she helps her mother at home and in the business.  Francisco, 17, no longer studies; he works in the fields.  Vaneli is in the fifth grade of elementary school.  Florina says that her children are no longer studying because she does not have the resources for them to continue studying but that they help her at home and in the business.

She works in sales, selling perfume and vegetables.  She has been in this business for three years already.  She goes out to sell in her town to her neighbors, who say that she sells very well.

She will invest her loan in buying perfume, creams, and vegetables such as chile, tomatoes, onion, potatoes, etc.  She hopes that it goes very well for her with the business because she would like for it to expand more.

Florina belongs to the El Girasol group, made up of ten people, two men and eight women, who are: Mercedes, Roselia, Noelia, Demetria, María, Brenda Liz, Iván, Sabas, and Carlos.  All of them have a business activity, such as vegetables, perfume, footwear via catalogue, grocery products, chicken sales, corn, beans, cosmetics, etc.

loans.use: to buy various perfumes and skin creams.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en: Belen, 37 years old, is married and has 4 children who are currently going to school. Belen works very hard to provide for them. For the past 8 years, Belen has operated a sari-sari store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as sugar, eggs, sardines, noodles, soap, etc. She has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items such as shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her store. In the future, Belen would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
CARLOS MANUEL TIENE 27 AÑOS DE EDAD ES CASADO TIENE UN HIJO, VIVE CON LA ESPOSA Y CON EL HIJO DE 2 AÑOS DE EDAD EN SAN MIGUEL DE BOLÍVAR.

CARLOS ES CHOFER OPERADOR. SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA COMPRAR CEMENTO, ARENA, RIPIO. CON LA AYUDA DEL CRÉDITO PODRÁ COMPRAR EL MATERIAL DE CONSTRUCCIÓN QUE TANTO NECESITA PARA EL MEJORAMIENTO DE LA VIVIENDA.

LAS COMPRAS LA REALIZARÁ EN GUARANDA.LOS DESAFÍOS A LOS QUE SE ENFRENTA ES CONTAR CON UN TRABAJO ESTABLE PARA PODER TENER INGRESOS.

eL SUEÑO ES PODER COMPRAR UN VEHÍCULO PARA LA FAMILIA. EN EL TIEMPO LIBRE LE GUSTA DEDICARSE A LA AGRICULTURA EN LOS TERRENOS DE LOS PADRES.
texts.en: Carlos Manuel, 27, is married and has a son.  He lives with his wife and two year old son in San Miguel de Bolívar.  Carlos is a driver/operator.  He’s asking for the loan to buy cement, sand and gravel.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy building materials and supplies he so needs to do some home improvements.  He will make his purchases in Guaranda.  The challenge he faces is to have a stable job so that he can earn income.  His dream is to buy a vehicle for his family.  In his free time he likes to do some farming on his parents’ fields.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en: Elena is a widow and she works hard to support her family. For the past 35 years, she has operated a fish vending business in the Philippines. Elena has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy fresh fish and seafood to sell. In the future, Elena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy fresh fish and seafood to sell

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
MARIA DEL CARMEN TIENE 29 AÑOS DE EDAD ES SOLTERA TIENE UN HIJO, VIVE CON LOS PADRES Y EL HIJO DE UN AÑO DE EDAD EN SAN MIGUEL DE BOLÍVAR. 

MARÍA DEL CARMEN SE DEDICA A DAR CLASES A LOS NIÑOS Y NIÑAS EN UNA ESCUELA PRIIMARIA. SOLICITA EL CRÉDITO PARA COMPRAR ARENA, RIPIO, CEMENTO. CON LA AYUDA DEL CRÉDITO PODRA REALIZAR EL MEJORAMIENTO DE VIVIENDA QUE TANTO QUERIA REALIZA.

LAS COMPRAS LO HARA EN GUARANDA. EL SUEÑO ES PODER COMPRARSE UN CARRO. LOS DESAFÍOS A LOS QUE SE ENFRENTA ES LA FALTA DE DINERO CUANDO MÁS LO NECESITA. 

EN EL TIEMPO LIBRE LE GUSTA LEER LIBROS DE ESPECIALIDAD PARA PODER ESTAR CAPACITADA PARA EDUCAR A LOS NIÑOS.
texts.en: María del Carmen is 29 years old, single and has a son.  She lives with her parents and her one year old son in San Miguel de Bolívar.  María del Carmen teaches boys and girls in an elementary school.  She’s asking for the loan to buy sand, gravel and cement.  With help from the loan she will be able to do some home improvements she so much wants to do.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.  Her dream is to buy herself a car.  The challenge she faces is not having money when she most needs it.  In her free time she likes to read books in her specialty to be better trained to teach children.

loans.use: to buy sand, gravel and cement.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz, 49 years old, is married and has 4 children. She resides in Tipan, Oroquieta, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Luz owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products. She has run the business for 2 years and earns PHP 3,000 a month from it. Luz has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (a chocolate and malt powder which is mixed with hot or cold water and/or milk to produce a beverage), shampoo, soaps, etc.

Luz joined GDMPC in 2009. In the future, she wants to build a house and to see her children finish their schooling.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
For over five years, Celia, a 56-year-old married mother of five children, has made a living by operating a general store in Paypayan, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She sells a variety of food and home-use products, earning 2,000 PHP a month.

In 2009, Celia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (a chocolate and malt powder which is mixed with hot or cold water and/or milk to produce a beverage), shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Larry

texts.en:
Larry is from Western Poblacion, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. He is 28 years old and married with two children. Larry operates a barber shop, which is a family business in the local community. Larry has been in his business for 8 years and earns 6,000 PHP a month from it.

In 2007, Larry joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Larry is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional equipment and tools such as scissors, etc. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment and tools

loans.name: José Martir

texts.es:
José tiene 18 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su mamá que es madre soltera. Él se dedica a estudiar, el año pasado termino el bachillerato. Es una persona luchadora, objetiva, tiene cinco hermanos que están estudiando.

José tiene dos meses de estar laborando en una empresa que vende accesorios, equipos, herramientas para vehículos, motocicletas, su salario es de $150 dólares, con el cual le ayuda a su mamá y a sus hermanos. Él viaja de lunes a domingo desde su casa hasta el desvió que son dos kilómetros y medio, camina cuarenta y cinco minutos, para luego abordar el autobús que lo conduce a su lugar de trabajo desde las 5:30 a.m. hasta las 7:00 p.m. que regresa a su casa.

Él busca cumplir sus sueños, para él y su familia, es por eso que solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 2 camionadas de piedra que cuestan $270, 1 camionada de arena que cuestan $240, 40 bolsas de cemento que cuestan $320, pago de mano de obra albañil y ayudante $200. De esta manera mejorara el piso de su casa que actualmente es de polvo y lo va hacer fraguado, es una casa humilde, de bahareque, pero él tiene sus valores y principios, desea que su familia se sienta orgullosa de sus proyectos familiares y personales, ya que quiere apoyar a sus hermanos y a su mamá.

José desea tener un mejor trabajo, comprar una motocicleta, construir una casa de bloque, ayudar a sus hermanos con el estudio y apoyar a su mamá.
texts.en:
José is 18 years old, single and lives with his mother who is a single mother.  He studies and last year completed high school.  He’s a tenacious, objective person who has five siblings who are attending school.

José has been working for a firm that sells accessories, equipment and tools for vehicles and motorcycles for the last two months; his salary is $150 dollars that he uses to help his mother and siblings.  He travels Monday to Sunday from home to the fork in the road which is two and a half kilometers, walks forty five minutes to then catch the bus that takes him to work from 5:30am until 7pm when he returns home.

He seeks to reach his dreams for himself and for his family and this is why he’s asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy two truckloads of rock that cost $270, one truckload of sand that costs $240, 40 sacks of cement that cost $320 and to pay labor costs for a bricklayer and his helper for $200.  In this way he will be able to improve the floor in his house which is currently dirt.  He’s going to make it out of cement.  It’s a humble home made from wattle and daub but he has his values and principles and wants his family to feel proud of his family and personal projects because he wants to support his mother and his siblings.

José would like to have a better job, to buy a motorcycle and to build a concrete block house, to help his siblings with their schooling and to help out his mother.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Cris Naldy

texts.es:
Cris es un joven muy trabajador y entusiasta, tiene 23 años de edad y ya es padre de una preciosa pequeña de 3 añitos, lastimosamente no vive junto a ella ya que se separo de la madre de su pequeña, por razones ajenas, pero ama y quiere a su hija mas que a nada porque es su motivo de vivir y salir adelante, siempre la visita de manera seguida y sobre todo cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con ella. Su padre de quien está muy orgulloso lo ayudo a estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma, ya que le gustaba mucho todo lo relacionado a la agricultura y el cuidado de cultivos. su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad conocida por su clima calido y la generosidad de sus pobladores, ademas de ser una ciudad en la cual una de sus actividades principales es la agricultura.

Desde hace tres años Cris tiene su negocio de Agropecuaria, en el cual vende fertilizantes para los cultivos agrícolas, trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y siempre les da una buena asesoría sobre qué productos pueden usar.

Cris está muy agradecido con los prestatarios ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar fertilizantes para su negocio, ya que se acerca la temporada de tubérculos y sus clientes le ha realizado varios pedidos, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir cada día luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño: “tener su propio local ya que actualmente es alquilado”.
texts.en:
Cris is a hardworking and enthusiastic young man. He is twenty-three years old and already the father of a precious little three-year-old girl. Unfortunately, he does not live with her since he separated from the mother of his little girl for other reasons. He loves and cares for his daughter more than anything because she is his reason for living and for going forward. He always visits her regularly, and he likes to go out strolling with her, especially when he can take a day off. 

His father, of whom he is very proud, helps him study for his degree in Agricultural Engineering, since he really likes everything related to agriculture and the care of crops. His home is located in the city Imperial, which is known for its warm climate and the generosity of its people, in addition to being a city in which one of the primary activities is agriculture.

For the past three years Cris has had his business Agropecuaria, in which he sells fertilizers for agricultural cultivation. He works around eight hours a day and believes that it will go well for him in his business because he is friendly with clients and always gives them good advice about what products they can use.

Cris is very grateful to the lenders. Thanks to the support they have provided, he will be able to buy fertilizers for his business, since the tuber season approaches and his clients have made various orders. This will permit him to improve his earnings and continue fighting every day for the realization of his great dream: "to have his own store, since that which he has now is rented."

loans.use:
Para la compra de fertilizantes
to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Josefa Maria

texts.es: Josefa con su anterior credikiva compró hilazas, elásticos, troqueles, encajes, 2 maquinas troqueladoras, cintas, broches y cuellos;  ella logró fabricar muchos  uniformes y está muy satisfecha con su venta. En la actualidad planea un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará hilos para zapatería, hilos para bordar y tejer y útiles de papelería que son productos con mucha demanda y buena rotación. Su mensaje para las organizaciones  que la apoyan es el siguiente:  “Me siento muy orgullosa de ser cliente de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, ya que me dieron la oportunidad de financiar mi crédito con Kiva, me siento muy bien atendida, gracias a ustedes mi negocio está mas surtido. “
texts.en:
Josefa used her previous Kiva loan to buy yarn, elastic, stamps, lace, two stamping machines, ribbon, clasps and collars.  She managed to manufacture many uniforms and she’s very satisfied with her sales.  She’s currently planning on a new Kiva loan to buy shoe making thread, embroidery and knitting thread and stationery supplies which are products in high demand and that turn over quickly.  


Her message for the organizations that support her is the following:  “I feel very proud to be a client of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo because they gave me the opportunity to finance my loan through Kiva.  I feel very well taken care of.  Thanks to you my business is better stocked.”

loans.use: to buy thread and office supplies.

loans.name: Mayuris

texts.es: Mayuris de 30 años es la propietaria de una tienda ubicada en Soledad, municipio del departamento del Atlántico, donde víveres con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 8 y 9 años. Mayuris oriunda de la población de Baranoa, aprendió la actividad comercial de su vecina y con ella identificó su aptitud hacia el negocio; por eso cuando se fue a vivir a la ciudad de Barranquilla,  inició con un pequeño negocio arrendando un local  y con poco capital con el cual surtió su tienda. Poco a poco compró los activos fijos necesarios para su buen desempeño y cuando todo estuvo completo, arrendó una casa y se instaló en Soledad, donde le ha ido bien y ha surgido, pero su mayor desafío es el poco capital de trabajo con el que cuenta para lograr su propósito de crecimiento y mas delante de tener su propia casa. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el que comprará víveres en mayor volumen, para ganar descuentos y tener  en su negocio un inventario de los productos que mas rotan como el arroz, aceite, azúcar café y detergente. Su credikiva permitirá  se perfila como exitosos porque le permitirá adquirir descuentos por compras en mayor cantidad y de contado y tener un stock de mercancías con el cual responderle a su cliente oportunamente y disminuyendo la frecuencia de compra generadora de gastos adicionales.
texts.en:
Mayuris, 30, owns a store located in Soledad, a municipality in Atlántico Department where she lives with her spouse and two children who are 8 and 9 years old.  Mayuris is originally from the town of Baranoa.  She learned her commercial activity from her neighbor who helped her notice her aptitude for business.  

Because of this, when she moved to the city of Barranquilla she started a business renting a small space and with a little capital stocked her store.  Gradually she bought the fixed assets needed to develop properly and when she had everything in hand she rented a house and set herself up in Soledad where she’s done well and has pushed ahead.  Her greatest challenge is the lack of working capital to reach her goal of growing and later on having a house of her own.

She’s currently applying for her Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo through which she will buy larger amounts of foodstuffs so that she can qualify for discounts and have her business stocked with inventory items that turn over quickly like rice, oil, sugar, coffee and detergent.

Her Kiva loan will help her acquire success because she will be able to qualify for volume purchase and cash payment discounts and to have a larger volume of merchandise to be able to respond to customers in a timely fashion and to lessen the frequency of purchases which generates additional costs.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo tiene 48 años de edad y  vive con  su familia en la comunidad de Turrialba, en la provincia de Cartago. La Ciudad de Cartago fue fundada en 1563 por el conquistador español Juan Vázquez de Coronado, fungió como capital de Costa Rica hasta 1823 y fue sede de la primera corte internacional permanente de la historia mundial, la Corte de Cartago. Su relieve montañoso está formado por dos cordilleras: la Central y la cordillera de Talamanca.

Don Alfredo se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la siembra de café, este producto se siembra en matas pequeñas llamadas almácigo, este almácigo se compra en matas individuales  según el área  disponible para sembrar, se puede sembrar para cultivar el grano o bien para producir más almácigo y proveer a otros agricultores, en el caso de don Alfredo es con ambos propósitos.

Es por esto que él está solicitando un crédito por el monto de 500,000.00 (quinientos mil colones) para comprar cierta cantidad de matas y para comprar abonos, plaguicidas, insecticidas y otros insumos necesarios para el mantenimiento de este cultivo.

Este es el cuarto préstamo que ha tenido con el proyecto y  ha sido de mucha ayuda y bendición para él y su familia, ya que ha logrado darles una mejor calidad de vida y ha cumplido muchas metas gracias a este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 48, lives with his family in the community of Turrialba in Cartago Province.  The city of Cartago was founded in 1563 by the Spanish conquistador, Juan Vázquez de Coronado. It was Costa Rica’s capital until 1823 and seat of the first permanent international court in history, the Corte de Cartago.  Its mountainous terrain is formed by two mountain ranges: the Central and the Talamanca ranges.

Alfredo is a farmer, specifically coffee.  This product is planted from small seedlings called “almácigo” which is purchased as individual plants according to the available area for planting.  They can be planted to harvest the beans or to produce more seedlings to supply to other farmers.  In Alfredo’s case it’s both.

Because of this he’s asking for a 500,000 (five-hundred thousand) colon loan to buy a certain amount of plants and to buy manure, insecticide, fungicide and other supplies needed for crop care.

This is the fourth loan he’s had with the project and it’s been of great help and blessing for him and his family since he’s managed to give them a better quality of life and has reached many goals thanks to the financing.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings.

loans.name: Parvinai

texts.ru: Парвинаи родилась 1992 году в семье рабочих. Она очень трудолюбивая и добрая девушка. В 2010 году успешно  закончила школу, и поступила в Худжандский филиал Политехнического Университета Таджикистана. Учится на втором курсе. В своей группе отличается отличной учебой и дисциплинированностью. Свободное время любит проводить в библиотеке. В будущем хочет стать хорошим специалистом по своей специальности и внести свой вклад в развитие экономики страны. Парвинаи хотела бы получить займ для оплаты своего обучения.
texts.en: Parvinai was born in 1992 to a worker's family. She is a hard working and kind girl. Parvinai has successfully finished high school in 2010 and started to attend Khujand branch of Tajikistan Polytechnic University. She is now in her second year of studies. Parvinai is known among students for her excellent grades and discipline, and she frequently spends her free time in the library. In the future she hopes to become a professional woman and contribute to the economic development of her country. Parvinai needs to take out this loan to continue financing her education.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Sonia Marilu

texts.es:
La señora Sonia es una mujer luchadora y que está muy enfocada en el triunfo, ella se dedica a cuidar de su pequeña de 5 años y está dispuesta a muchas cosas con el fin de tenerla siempre muy bien cuidada, educada y contenta. Sonia siempre trata de pasar el mayor tiempo posible con su pequeña, es por eso que disfruta de ver películas junto a ella todas las tardes.

Sonia es comestóloga desde hace algunos, ella ha instalado todos sus materiales en la sala de su casa, lo que le permite tener mayor cercanía con su hija. Ella siempre se esfuerza por pintar y arreglar el cabello de las personas, de esta manera estas se sentirán contentas y querrán no solo visitarla siempre si no que también la recomendaran con otros clientes.

Con la ayuda que se le está brindando ella podrá tarrajear una habitación de su casa, lo que le permitirá que su pequeña viva en mejores condiciones. Sonia se ha esforzado mucho durante estos años y está deseosa de que su hija se sienta feliz y orgullosa a su lado,  ella desea esforzarse cada vez más, de esa manera podrá darle a su pequeña la mejor educación y protección.
texts.en:
Sonia is a fighter and very focused on success. She dedicates herself to caring for her little five-year-old daughter, and is ready to do many things with the goal of having her daughter always well cared for, educated, and content. Sonia always tries to spend the greatest possible amount of time with her little one, and it is for this reason that she enjoys watching movies with her every afternoon.

Sonia has been a cosmetologist for several years. She has installed all her supplies in the living room of her house, which allows her to be closer to daughter. She always does her best when she is making up her clients and arranging their hair. This way, they will feel content and will not only want to always return to her but will also recommend her to other clients.

With the support that she is being given, Sonia will be able to plaster the walls of one room of her house, which will allow her daughter to live in better conditions. Sonia has made a great effort during these years and she is desirous that her daughter feel happy and proud at her side. Sonia wants to make an even greater effort every time—for in this way, she will be able to give her daughter the best education and protection.

loans.use: to plaster the walls of one room of her house.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina tiene 51 años de edad y  vive con  su familia en la comunidad de Turrialba, en la provincia de Cartago. La Ciudad de Cartago fue fundada en 1563 por el conquistador español Juan Vázquez de Coronado, fungió como capital de Costa Rica hasta 1823 y fue sede de la primera corte internacional permanente de la historia mundial, la Corte de Cartago. Su relieve montañoso está formado por dos cordilleras: la Central y la cordillera de Talamanca.

Cristina se dedica a la costura, ella confecciona  prendas de vestir encargadas por los vecinos de la comunidad, además vende algunas prendas para niños, cortinas confeccionadas por ella , necesita para esto comprar telas, hilos y otros materiales.

Es por esto que ella está solicitando un crédito por el monto de 700,000.00 (setecientos mil colones) para comprar cierta cantidad de telas, accesorios y otros materiales.

Este es el primer préstamo que solicita al proyecto y asegura que le es de gran bendición tanto  a ella como a su  familia, ya que así logrará darles una mejor calidad de vida , Cristina es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de CREINSA, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica, que benefician a  gran cantidad de personas emprendedoras y visionarias.
texts.en:
Cristina is fifty-one years old and lives with her family in the community of Turrialba, in the province of Cartago. The city of Cartago was founded in 1563 by the Spanish conquistador Juan Vázquez de Coronado. It served as the capital of Costa Rica until 1823 and was the seat of the first permanent international court in world history, the Court of Cartago. Its mountainous landscape is formed by two mountain ranges: the Central range and the range of Talamanca. 

Cristina makes her living as a seamstress. She makes pieces of clothing commissioned by neighbors in the community and also sells some clothing for children as well as curtains that she makes herself. For this, she needs to buy fabrics, thread, and other materials.

It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan in the amount of 700,000.00 CRC in order to buy a certain quantity of fabric, accessories, and other materials.

This is the first loan that she has requested for the project and she assures us that it is a great blessing both for her and for her family, since this way she will be able to give them a better quality of life. Cristina is a member of the Empresa de Crédito Comunal (communal credit organization) of CREINSA, one of the 150 associate organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica, which benefit a great number of entrepreneurial and visionary people.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, and materials to make pieces of clothing

loans.name: Maria Gregoria

texts.es: Doña Maria es dueña de un Kiosko ubicado en el centro de la ciudad en donde vende bebidas refrescos gaseosas,batidos , malteadas de leche y repostería en variedad desde hace más de veinte años es casada y tiene 5 hijos de los cuales tiene a cargo solo  2 estudian en secundaria. Este es su segundo crédito su primer crédito lo utilizo para comprar ingredientes para realizar malteadas, batidos de frutas, repostería, sándwich nos cuenta que fue muy bueno para su negocio pues logro vender y ofrecer variedad en batidos y comidas en su kiosco . Actualmente solicito el financiamiento para invertir en gaseosa, snacks, jugos, agua embotellada, caramelos, pan y otros productos ya que en  esta época del año aumentan su venta debido  al calor del verano.
texts.en:
Doña Maria is the owner of a food stall located in the city center where she has sold sodas, smoothies, milkshakes and pastries in great variety for more than 20 years.  She is married and has five children, two of whom she has care of and who study in secondary school.

This is her second loan.  She used her first loan to buy ingredients to make milkshakes, fruit smoothies, desserts, and sandwiches.  She tells us that it went very well for her business, since she could offer and sell a variety of smoothies and foods in her stall.

She is currently asking for financing to invest in sodas, snacks, juices, bottled water, candies, bread and other products since at this time of year her sales increase due to the summer heat.

loans.use: to invest in sodas, snacks, juices, bottled water, candies, bread and other products.

loans.name: Sergio Arturo

texts.es:
Sergio es un joven de 19 años, que se esfuerza día a día con el fin de ganar el dinero suficiente para que no le falte nada a su pareja ni a su bebé de 8 meses. Esta pequeña familia ha buscado la manera de crear oportunidades de trabajo con el fin de empezar a consolidarse económicamente.

Sergio se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte público en una moto taxi alquilada durante todo el día, mientras el sale a la calle desde muy temprano para llevar los alimentos diarios a casa de sus padres, lugar en donde vive actualmente con su nueva familia. Su pareja también apoya en los ingresos que se necesitan es por ello que se dedica a la venta de ropa durante todo el día, mientras esta con la pequeña.

Con un poco de ayuda y esfuerzo, Sergio podrá sacar su SOAT y licencia de conducir que necesita actualmente, ya que recién se ha iniciado en el negocio y debe tener su documentación al día para no tener ningún tipo de problemas con las autoridades nacionales, de esta manera también desea poder ayudar a su pareja y comprar nueva ropa para que pueda venderla. Sergio está muy agradecido por el apoyo, porque de esta manera podrá trabajar en lugares más alejados y así ahorrar un poco de dinero para poder comprarse su propia moto taxi, y con sus nuevos ingresos, al no pagar alquiler, podrá cumplir su gran sueño “Tener un casa propia”
texts.en:
Sergio, 19, is a young man who strives daily aiming at earning enough money so that his spouse and 8 month old baby will lack nothing.  This small family is looking for the way to create work opportunities hoping to start to consolidate economically.

Sergio provides public transportation services with a mototaxi he leases for the entire day going out in to the streets starting very early in order to provide food for his parents’ house which is where he’s currently living with his new family.  His spouse also chips in income that they need because she works selling clothes all day while caring for their little one.

With a little help and effort, Sergio will be able to pay for his SOAT [required accident insurance policy] and for the driver’s license he needs since he’s just recently started his business and he must have this documentation up to date to not have any problems with the national authorities.  In this way he also wants to help his spouse and buy new clothes for her to sell.

Sergio is very grateful for the support because this way he will be able to work in more distant places and save up money to buy his own mototaxi and with his new income, by not paying rental, he will be able to reach his great dream: “To have a house of my own.”

loans.use: to pay insurance premium and driver's license fees.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Его жена занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Начиная с 1998 году Бахтиёр занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота и является собственником своего бизнеса. Он начинал свой бизнес с 1 голов крупного рогатого скота. Данный момент в обороте имеет 3-голов крупного рогатого скота. Приобретает скот на местном рынке. Бахтиёр запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью увлечения поголовье скота.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a kind and hard working man. He is married and is raising three children. His wife is a farmer. Since 1998 Bakhtiyor has been raising and reselling cattle and is an independent businessman. He started with only one cow, but currently has three cows in his herd. Barkhtiyor purchases the animals at the local market and is requesting this loan to purchase another cow for his herd.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Said

texts.ru: Саид-семейный,отец четырех взрослых сыновей.Несмотря на свой возраст постоянно работает и помогает семье.Два старших сына живут отдельно со своими семьями,два последних живут с родителями.Младший сын еще не женат и Саид вместе с женой хотят сыграть его  свадьбу.Получив наш первый кредит клиент намного улучшил свои семейные условия,купил собственный микроавтобус, и рад этому.Очередной кредит использует на ремонт своего микроавтобуса,который требует постоянного ремонта.
texts.en: Said is a family man and a father of four adult sons. Despite his age he is constantly working and helping his family. Two of his sons lives separately with their families, the other two still live with their parents. The youngest son is not marries and Said with his wife want to organize a wedding for him. Using his first loan Said was able to significantly improve his family's living conditions and buy a minibus which he loves. This new loan Said is planning to use to perform extensive repairs on the minibus which breaks down frequently.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy corn for tortillas and a tortilla press.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a storeroom for his tools.

loans.name: Norberta Isamar

texts.es:
Norberta tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera. Este ya es su segundo crédito, con el primero quedo muy satisfecha, ya que la producción de Kenaf la vendió gracias al apoyo del crédito y obtuvo más beneficios para su familia. Por lo que, hoy solicita un nuevo préstamo para cultivar 56,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y para preparar el kenaf. 

Con el nuevo préstamo, espera obtener una mayor producción y mayor fuente de ingresos para su familia. De las ganancias que reciba desea reparar su casa poco a poco y comprar cosas que no posee. Norberta desea ser una de las personas que más producen  granos básicos en la zona.
texts.en:
Norberta is 21 years old and single.  This is her second loan.  She was very satisfied with the first, since she sold the crop of kenaf (Deccan jute) thanks to the help of the loan and obtained benefits for her family.

Because of this, she is asking for another loan to cultivate 56,000 square meters of corn and to prepare the kenaf.  With the new loan, she hopes to obtain greater production and a better source of income for her family.  With the earnings that she receives she wants to repair her house little by little and buy things that she doesn't have.  Norberta wants to be one of the people who produce basic grains in the region.

loans.use: to cultivate 56,000 square meters of corn and to prepare the kenaf (Deccan hemp)

loans.name: Abunzubumwe A /rsz Group

texts.fr:
Théogene fait partie du groupe Abunzubumwe A /Rsz. Il a 51 ans, il est marie avec 10 enfants de 3 ans à 22 ans, dont 4 scolarises. 

Théogene est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées et des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Théogene voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Théogene is a member of the Abunzubumwe A /Rsz group. He is 51, married, and has 10 children ranging in age from 3 to 22 years of age. Four of his children go to school.

Théogene is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizer and to pay for labor. 

His plan to grow his business is to use pedigreed seeds and chemical fertilizer for his rice farming. 

In the next few years, Théogene would like to be the premier farmer in his region. With his profits, he would like to pay for his children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tamales.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja la cual la apoya mucho en todo lo que ella hace y asimismo trabaja vendiendo pan, realiza trabajos de plomería, electricidad y albañilería, es un mil oficios como decimos acá en Perú, junto a ella también viven  sus preciosos hijos de 7 y 1 año de edad a los cuales ama mucho y son el mejor regalo que Dios le ha podido dar a una mujer y por los cuales daría la vida con verlos felices. Su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, Ica Perú. El Distrito de Santiago se caracteriza por albergar varias empresas agroexportadoras, las cuales brindan muchos empleos en la zona y sobre todo porque este distrito se caracteriza también por su actividad agrícola, en especial el cultivo de espárragos, uva y algodón.  En su tiempo libre Rosa disfruta de pasear con sus hijos o tan solo conversar o jugar con ello, asimismo le gusta cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos “Cara pulcra con Sopa Seca”.
 
Cada día Rosa se levanta muy temprano para iniciar su negocio de venta de Refrescos y raspadillas en temporada de verano porque en invierno vende desayunos; ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 6 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende con cariño a sus clientes y por ello siempre regresan a su negocio.

Rosa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mesas, sillas y bancos para poder darles más comodidad a sus clientes, así seguir trabajando y luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”, ya que actualmente vive en casa de los padres de su pareja.
texts.en:
Rosa, 30, lives with her spouse who supports her very much in everything she does and also works selling bread, doing plumbing, electrical and bricklaying jobs; he’s a jack of all trades like we say here in Perú.  Their two precious children who are 1 and 7 years old also live with them; she loves them very much and they are the greatest gift God can give a woman and for whom she’d give her life just to see them happy.  

Her house is located in Santiago District in Ica, Perú.  Santiago district is noted for being the home of several exporter agribusinesses which provide much employment in the zone.  This district is noted above all for its agricultural activity, especially spinach, grape and cotton growing.  In her free time Rosa likes to go out on excursions with her children or simply to chat and play with them; she also likes to cook one of her favorite dishes, “Cara Pulcra con Sopa Seca.”

Rosa rises very early to start her business selling refreshments and shaved ice during the summer and in winter she sells breakfasts.  She spends about 6 hours daily at work.  She believes that she does well in her business because she treats all her customers with kindness and that’s why they keep coming back to her business.

Rosa is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given her she will be able to buy tables, chairs and benches to provide more comfort for her customers and continue working and striving daily to make her great dream a reality: “To own my own house.”  She currently lives in the house of her spouse’s parents.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs and benches.

loans.name: Anali Giovanna

texts.es:
Anali es una joven madre de 24 años, que junto a su esposo luchan diariamente con el fin de brindarle lo mejor a su pequeña de 1 año, por la que dan todo en su trabajo y labor diario. Anali pudo poner una bodega gracias a los ingresos que percibía por el trabajo de su esposo, el cual labora como ayudante en un restaurant. Con mucha disciplina y amor a las cosas, ella decidió emprender esta nueva aventura debido a que fue su madre quien le enseño sobre el manejo de este tipo de negocio.

Ella siempre se ha esforzado por darles el mejor trato posible a sus clientes, para que de esta manera se sientan seguros y contento de comprarle. Anali ha pasado por muchos retos, entre estos los desastres naturales, tales como terremotos y fuertes lluvias, lo que la ha llevado a tener que hacer algunas reparaciones constantes en su casa.

Con un poco de apoyo, Anali desea poder comprar una refrigeradora que es muy necesaria en  temporada de verano, para que sus clientes puedan comprar las bebidas heladas que siempre necesitan, también desea comprar algunos andamios para mostrar los nuevos productos que piensa vender.

Anali desea mucho salir adelante y así con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación poder tener una tienda comercial de abarrotes, su gran sueño.
texts.en:
Anali is a young mother of 24, who together with her husband struggles daily with the goal of giving the best to their little girl of one year.  For her they give their all in their work and daily labor.  Anali was able to start a store thanks to the income from the job of her husband, who works as an assistant in a restaurant.  With much discipline and love of things, she decided to begin this new adventure thanks to the fact that her mother taught her how to manage this type of business.  She has always worked to give the best deals to her customers so that they will feel happy and secure buying from her.

Anali has had many challenges.  Among these are natural disasters such as earthquakes and strong rains, which have caused her to have to make constant repairs to her house.  With a little bit of help, Anali wants to be able to buy a refrigerator which is much needed in the summer time, so that her customers can buy cold beverages that they always need.  She also hopes to buy some shelving to display the new products that she is thinking of selling.

Anali very much wants to get ahead and in this way, with much energy and dedication, be able to have a regular grocery store, her big dream.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, shelving and products.

loans.name: Juana Rosario

texts.es:
Juana Rosario tiene 45 años, vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos a quienes ama muchísimo y por los cuales trabaja muy duro para sacarlos adelante y que sean mejores que ella, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los atractivos turísticos más importantes del país, los cuales son el Candelabro de paracas y las “Islas Ballestas”, asimismo tiene como actividades principales la pesca y la agricultura. 

Juana es muy trabajadora, desde hace ya 2 años inicio su negocio de venta de gaseosas y cervezas, ella trabaja alrededor d e10 horas al día y los fines de semana hasta 15 horas y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es atenta con los clientes.

Juan está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio en especial cervezas y gaseosas, lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y hacer que sean felices”.
texts.en:
Juana Rosario is 45 years old and lives with her husband and two children. She loves them very much, and it's because of them that she works so hard to get them ahead in life, so that they will have it better than she did. Her home is located in the city of Pisco, which is known for some of the most important tourist attractions in the country: the Paracas Candelabra and the Ballestas Islands. Primary economic activities include fishing and agriculture. 

Juana is very hardworking. She opened her business selling sodas and beer two years ago; she works around 10 hours a day, and up to 15 hours on weekends. She can wait on up to 40 customers in a day. She believes that her business is doing well because she is attentive to her customers. 

Juana is very appreciative to Kiva lenders; it's thanks to the help they've given that she will be able to buy merchandise for her business, particularly beer and soda. This will allow her to have more variety to offer her customers and she can continue working toward her big dream: "to give careers to her children and ensure that they will be happy."

loans.use: to buy merchandise (sodas and beer).

loans.name: La Florida Group

texts.es: La Sra. Aurea  es separada, tiene 2 hijos y tiene 61 años de edad,  actualmente es socia  en la alcancía comunal “La florida ” grupo  conformado por 8  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Aurea se dedica al alquiler de cuartos este negocio surge a raiz de su divorcio ya que tuvo que trabajar muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, es asi que Aurea solicito prestamos para construir su casa y empezar a alquilar, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacion a logrado mejores ingresos economicos sus hijos fueron a la escuela y les ofrecio una mejor calidad de vida, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar materiales y terminar acabados en su casa. Aurea cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Aurea, 61, is separated and  she has 2 children. She is currently a member of the communal bank “La Florida”.  a group of 8 members who are active in different businesses.  Aurea rents rooms.  Her business started with her divorce since she had to stop her hard work to get her children ahead.  Thus she requested a loan to build her house and to begin renting.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she has succeeded in getting higher earnings, her children have been able to go to school, and she has offered them a better quality of life.  Her goal is to continue growing her business and so she has requested a new loan to buy construction materials and complete the architectural finishings on her house.  Aurea will fulfill her goals by working hard and putting in a lot of effort.  The loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and complete her house and the architectural finishings

loans.name: Duo San Raymundo Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN RAYMUNDO
Este dúo está formado por Miriam Leonor, de 29 años de edad, ella es soltera, y es dueña de una pequeña tienda ubicada en la entrada de San Raymundo, desde hace año y medio y nos cuenta que desde hace varios meses  ha estado pensado en adquirir un crédito pero que las circunstancias no se lo han permitido ahora quiere que Fape Y KIVA pueda apoyarla ya que su tienda necesita de algunos productos comestibles de consumo diario que aun no tiene en su tienda por falta de dinero, también esta doña Lorena, de 26 años de edad tiene 3 hijos,Y ella esta solicitando este credito para compra de mercaderia para su negocio.
texts.en:
San Raymundo Duo

This duo includes Miriam Leonor, 29 years old. She is single and has been the owner of a small store located at the entrance of San Raymundo for a year and a half. She tells us that for a few months now she has been thinking about getting a loan, but that circumstances haven't permitted her.  

Now she wants FAPE and Kiva to be able to help her now that her store needs some food products for daily consumption that she still doesn't have in her store due to lack of money. 

Lorena, 26 years old, is also part of the duo. She has 3 children, and is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to buy food products for daily consumption

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy daily convenience products.

loans.name: Duo Peña De Oro Group

texts.es: Duo Peña de Oro, Vivian Isabel de 31 años de edad es casada y tiene 2 hijos,se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 5 años ella nos cuenta que a luchado por sus hijos ya que el mas grande sueño de ella es que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas ya que nececita mas capital y asi seguir creciendo con su negocio.
texts.en:
This is the "Duo Peña de Oro" group. Vivian Isabel is 31, married, and has two children.  She has been selling tortillas for five years. She tells us that she has struggled for her children's sake, as her greatest dream is for her children to have a better future.  

She is applying for this loan in order to buy corn for making tortillas, as she needs more working capital. This way she will keep her business growing.

loans.use: To buy corn for making tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her stock of merchandise

loans.name: Duo Mujeres La Giralda Group

texts.es: Duo Mujeres la Giralda. Dolores.tiene 59 años de edad es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la elaboracion de tejidos tipicos a mano y a la crianza de animales desde hace varios años,ya que ella es una persona que vive sola y ella dia a dia se dedica a su actividad economica ya que su esposo a fallecido y ella a salido adelante por si sola, tambien se dedica a la venta de chuchitos tamales y chiles rellenos, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos y para la compra de insumos para elavorar tamales.
texts.en: Dolores is a 59 year-old hardworking woman and a member of Duo Mujeres de la Giralda Communal Bank. She has been producing hand-made traditional woven goods for several years, as well as raising animals, since she is a person who lives alone. Day after day, she works hard since her husband has passed away and she has to get ahead on her own. She also sells small Guatemalan tamales and chiles rellenos. She is applying for a loan to buy the basic materials to make her woven goods and the supplies to make tamales.

loans.use: to buy basic materials to make woven goods and the ingredients to make tamales.

loans.name: Cathérine

texts.fr:
Catherine est une jeune femme agée de 31 ans, mariée et mère de 02 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 2 ans. le prémier va déjà à l'école. elle possède un petit atelier de couture et sollicite un crédit  pour non seulement amenager son atelier construit en planches déjà en ruine, mais aussi augmenter son petit fonds de commerce en s'achetant plus de tissus, et une machine ce qui permettra d'augmenter ses ventes et de réaliser un bénéfice plus important.

le bénéfice tiré de ce prêt lui permettra d'ameliorer sa production, mais aussi d'aider son époux avec les petites dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Catherine is a 31-year-old woman who is married and the mother of two children, from 2 to 12 years old. The first child is already in school. Catherine owns a small sewing workshop and is requesting a loan for not only renovating her ramshackled shop made of boards but also for increasing her business capital. The loan is for buying more fabrics and a [sewing] machine. This will enable her to increase her sales and to make more substantial profits.  

The profits derived from this loan will enable her to improve her production, as well as to help her husband in covering small day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics and sewing supplies

loans.name: Ayudanos Señor 1 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Lucienne is one of the members of the Ayúdanos Señor (Help Us Lord) Group 1 & 5. The majority of the group's members are Dominican-Haitians or emigrants from Haiti who live in 'bateyes' (company towns where sugar workers live) in the town of Romana, one of the Dominican Republic's tourist destinations, which has a high scale of luxury. Lucienne's business is selling food, which she cooks to distribute to the workers and to sell from her home to her neighbors. She has two children. She tells us that her biggest challenge is sending her children to university and that she enjoys going to church.

Lucienne is very excited to be receiving her seventh loan from Esperanza Internacional and will invest it in her business, which she has had for about 12 years. She is planning to invest her loan in buying different cooking ingredients such as rice, oil, beans, meat, vegetables, etc. She is dreaming of expanding her established business into a small restaurant in her community.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, beans, meat, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Rufa

texts.en:
Rufa is married, 55 years of age, and lives in Paypayan, Oroquieta, Misamis Occidental together with her seven kids. She produces and sells charcoal to local members to earn a living. 

Rufa has been in this business for four years, and she earns 1,200 PHP every month. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase coconut shells for charcoal making. She joined GDMPC in 2009. Rufa wishes that their business would become more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase coconut shells for charcoal making.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Con su microempresa Fidel  se siente muy contento, pues le ha permitido adquirir su vivienda y por eso está muy entusiasmado en hacerlo  crecer aun mas. Hoy Fidel tiene un gran desafío,  porque quiere una vez mas,  aumentar  su capital de trabajo para incrementar su clientela;  esta es la razón por la cual acude a un segundo credikiva, segundo financiamiento tambien, que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor volumen, pescado y mariscos; con esta inversión   incrementará el volumen de sus ventas y dará respuesta a su creciente clientela, especialmente en la temporada de la semana santa en la cual son mayores las posibilidades de generar mayores ingresos y de abordar  nuevos mercados en diversos barrios de la ciudad de Barranquilla, lo preveemos hará que esta  inversión sea exitosa. Su mensaje a los finaciadoresd e Kiva es el siguiente. " Gracias y que sigan con gran el apoyo que le prestan a la microempresa, con los recursos económicos a bajo costo."
texts.en:
Fidel is very satisfied with his small business, which has allowed him to acquire his home; that's why he's very excited to grow his business even more. Today Fidel faces a big challenge, because he wants to once more increase in working capital in order to increase his customer base. 

This is why he's turning to a second Kiva loan - also his second loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With the funds he will buy fish and seafood in large quantities. The investment will increase his sales volumes in response to his growing customer base, especially during the time around the Holy Week, when the possibility of generating greater income and entering new markets in various neighborhoods of the city of Barranquilla is greater. What FMSD provides will make this investment successful. 

His message to Kiva lenders is the following: "Thank you and hopefully you will continue with the great support that you give to small business, like economic resources at a lower cost."

loans.use: to buy fish and seafood in large quantities.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy, a 45-year-old, married mother of two children, has made a living through the operation of a general store by selling a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 2,000 PHP a month for these activities. Daisy lives in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental.

In 2009, Daisy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Djekafo Group

texts.fr:
Majoritairement mariées dans des familles nucléaires, les cinq femmes du groupe Djekafo ont  en moyenne 33 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le quartier Médine de la ville de San. Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de leurs activités professionnelles et de parenté. Elles font l’achat et la vente de  boissons, d’habits, de céréales et bien d’autres produits alimentaires. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1 er   prêt solidaire.
Madame,  Kadia  ( 1ere femme debout de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) s’est spécialisée dans la vente de riz importés et de productions locales. Elle est très sollicitée et appréciée dans la ville de San et envions. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 400 sacs de riz auprès des paysans producteurs du casier rizicole de San. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Kadia espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 32.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et  aider son conjoint à subvenir aux dépenses de la familles.
texts.en:
For the most part married in nuclear families, the five women of the group Djekafo average 33 years of age and three children each. The women all live in the Médine district of San City. They know one another through ties of community, professional work, and kinship. They buy and sell beverages, clothing, grains, and many other goods. 

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan. 

Ms. Kadia (the first woman standing from right to left in the photo) is specialized in selling imported and domestic rice. She is much in demand and appreciated in and around San City. 

She intends to use her loan to buy 400 sacks of rice from peasant producers of the San rice fields. Accepting cash or credit, she sells retail to a customer base composed of men and women.

With this loan, Ms. Kadia hopes to make an average monthly profit of 32,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and helping her spouse to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to buy rice

loans.name: Micah

texts.en:
Micah is 55 years old and married with four children. He sells human medicine to earn a living. Micah has been doing this for four years, and he has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because he has many regular customers. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Micah has been able to educate his children, and he hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy human medicine to sell.

loans.use: to buy medicine to sell.

loans.name: Fotemogoban Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les quatre femmes du groupe Fotemogoban ont  en moyenne 40 ans et 7 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Dallan dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de leurs activités professionnelles et de parenté. Elles font l’achat et la vente de légumes, d’habits de poissons et de la restauration. 
Dans le but de satisfaire le besoin de leurs clientèles de plus en plus nombreuses et exigeantes, les membres du groupe ont décidé  d’intégrer  le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  5 eme  prêt solidaire, après avoir correctement remboursés les quatre précédents.
Madame,   Assan   (1ere de la droite  vers la droite sur la photo) excelle dans la vente de légumes. Elle est très sollicitée dans le village de Dallan et ses environnants. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 paniers de choux pommés, 2 paniers d’aubergines, 1 panier de carottes et 1 panier de betteraves auprès des maraîchers de San et environs. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle mixtes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame Assan espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 16.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et  aider son conjoint dans la prise en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
For the most part married in traditional extended families, the four women of the group Fotemogoban average 40 years of age and seven children each. The women all live in the village of Dallan, in the Region of Ségou (4th administrative region of Mali). They know one another through ties of community, professional work, and kinship. They buy and sell vegetables, clothing, and fish, and they work in food service. 

With the goal of meeting the needs of their demanding and burgeoning customer base, the group members joined the loan program  of the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. They are now on their fifth solidarity loan after having correctly repaid the four previous ones. 

Ms. Assan (the first woman from right in the photo) excels in selling vegetables. She is in high demand in and around Dallan City. She intends to use her loan to buy 5 baskets of savoy cabbages, 2 baskets of eggplants, a basket of carrots, and a basket of beets from the market gardeners in and around San. Accepting cash or credit, she sells retail to a  mixed customer base. 

With this loan, Ms. Assan hopes to make an average monthly profit of 16,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in her business and helping her spouse to cover household needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Akouavi's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de deux personnes. La représentante du nom d'Akouavi est âgée de 51ans. Akouavi est veuve et à un enfant. Akouavi n'est pas instruite. Pour supporter les charges quotidiennes, elle mène comme activité la vente de nourritures. Ses achats se font en gros dans l'un des marchés de la place. Dans le souci de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Akouavi sollicite, ensemble avec sa coéquipière un micro-crédit auprès de Finadev. La responsable est celle qui se retrouve à droite de la photo.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of two persons whose representative is named Akouavi. She is 51 years old and a widow with one child. Akouavi is uneducated. To cover her day-to-day expenses, she runs a business selling food. Her purchases are made wholesale at one of the local markets. 

Concerned about responding to the demands of her customers, Akouavi, along with her teammate, is requesting a microloan from Finadev. 

The official is the one found at the right in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a sack of corn, a sack of rice, a box of spaghetti, a box of fish, and some condiments

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es comerciante, tiene dos hijas y 5 hijos, es casada, y reside en la Aldea de La Concepcion en el municipio de Juticalpa. 

Alejandrina tiene mas de 15 años de dedicarse a la elaboracion y venta de rosquillas y quesadillas. Ella aprendió de este oficio porque trabajó con una vecina que se dedicaba a lo mismo y tambien aprendió gracias a algunos cursos de panaderia que recibió en el Instituto Nacional de Formacion Profesional (INFOP). Su negocio esta instalado en su casa de habitacion y aun no tiene nombre, su horario laboral inicia a las 4:00 am y trabaja con sus dos hijas, ellas le ayudan a preparar la masa y luego estan pendiente de llevar el tiempo de que debe permanecer el producto en el horno. Luego de que sale el producto lo acomoda en una paila de plastico y sale a venderlo de casa en casa y de negocio en negocio. Ella considera que su mayor ventaja consiste en que sus productos tienen un sabor especial y que ademas es una persona amigable que simpatiza con otras personas y eso le ayuda a vender.
